NK073(pu)005:1: // man ngag lta ba'i phreng ba'i tshig don gyi 'grel
NK073(pu)005:2: zin mdor bsdus pa zab don pad tshal 'byed pa'i
NK073(pu)005:3: nyi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so //
NK073(pu)005:4: na mo gu ru sh+r+ai ma h+aa su kha p+aa d+aa ya /
NK073(pu)005:5: gnyis rtog chos kun dbyings su rab zhi shes dang shes bya ro mnyam pas /
NK073(pu)005:6: brjod med ngang las brjod pa'i cho 'phrul mos pa du ma'i rjes su 'jug /
NK073(pu)005:7: srid pa'i 'khrul 'khor gzhi ru zlog la kun kyang dgongs pa gcig tu 'babs //
NK073(pu)005:8: dus gsum rgyal las phrin las khyad 'phags pad+ma sam b+har gus phyag 'tshal //
NK073(pu)005:9: 'ajama dpa' gzhon nu bshes gnyen tshul 'dzin pa //
NK073(pu)005:10: chos chen dbyangas kyis bstan 'gro'i snang chen spel //
NK073(pu)005:11: mkhyen pa gnyis ldan rjes brtse'i 'dzum zer can //
NK073(pu)005:12: mkhas grub dabnga po dpal ldan bla mar 'dud //
NK073(pu)005:13: zab don 'byed la rnam dpyod mthu dman kyang //
NK073(pu)005:14: thams cad gzigs pa zhal lung bdud rtsi'i chab //
NK073(pu)005:15: rnyogs med yi ge'i lam du drang ba la //
NK073(pu)005:16: blo ldan skal ba bzang rnams don gnyer byos //
NK073(pu)005:17: de'ang bcom ldan 'das khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen
NK073(pu)005:18: pos sgra thal 'gyur rtsa ba'i rgyud las lung bstan
NK073(pu)005:19: pa ltar rigs gsum mgon po mi bdag gi rnam
NK073(pu)005:20: par snang ba'i chos rgyal mes dpon rnam pa gsum
NK073(pu)005:21: gyi nang nas 'jam dbyangs rnam 'phrul lha btsad po
NK073(pu)005:22: khri srong lde'u btsan gyi sku ring la /
NK073(pu)005:23: 'phags yul pan chen du ma bod du spyan drangs
NK073(pu)005:24: nas dam pa chos kyi nyi ma khor yug tu
NK073(pu)005:25: brdal bar mdzad pa'i nang nas gangs can pa'i 'gro
NK073(pu)005:26: ba yongs la bka' drin khyad par du che ba
NK073(pu)005:27: rdo rje theg pa thun mong ma yin pa'i shing
NK073(pu)005:28: rta'i srol 'byed / sngags kyi ston mchog dpal bde
NK073(pu)005:29: ba chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas zhabs kyis zab cing
NK073(pu)005:30: rgya che ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bsam las 'das
NK073(pu)005:31: pa bskor te gdul bya rnams gdod ma'i sa la
NK073(pu)005:32: dbugs dbyung bar mdzad pa las /
NK073(pu)005:33: man ngag lta ba'i phreng ba dang ma mo gsang
NK073(pu)005:34: ba las kyi thig le gnyis chos rgyal la dngos
NK073(pu)005:35: su gdams pa gdul bya thun mong ba rnams la'ang
NK073(pu)005:36: yongs su grags shing yi ge'i phreng bar bar ma
NK073(pu)005:37: chad du byon pas mkhas pa mang pos khungs su
NK073(pu)005:38: drangs pa'i gzhung rtsod med du grub pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:39: lta phreng la rong zom pan+di tas mdzad pa'i 'grel pa khyad par can sogs bzhugs mod /
NK073(pu)005:40: bar skabs su rgyun srab pa bka' bab bdun gyi
NK073(pu)005:41: mnga' bdag rje bla ma rin po che'i thugs bskyed
NK073(pu)005:42: kyi mthu las bstan pa'i me ro bslangs pa'i phrin
NK073(pu)005:43: las kyi rgyun la phan par 'dod pa'i lhag bsam
NK073(pu)005:44: gyis drangs te / phyogs mtshon tsam gyi rtogs sla'i
NK073(pu)005:45: bsdus 'grel zin thun gyi tshul du dgod pa la
NK073(pu)005:46: gyis drangs te / gsum / klad kyi don /
NK073(pu)005:53: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lta ba dang mdo sngags kyi thega pa /
NK073(pu)005:54: la sogas pa'i khongs nas lam gyi grogs spyod pa
NK073(pu)005:55: dang 'bras bu'i rnam bzhag so so'i khyada para phyogs
NK073(pu)005:56: gcig tu snying por bsdusa nas rje 'bangs rnams kyi
NK073(pu)005:57: don du grub pa'i slob dpon chen po nyid kyis
NK073(pu)005:58: mdzad pa'i bskyud byang ste brjed byang gi yi ge'o
NK073(pu)005:59: // mtshan de ltar brjod pa'i dgos pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:60: gzhung gi bstan don nges sla ba dang /
NK073(pu)005:61: glegs bam tshol ba la 'jug bde ba'i don du bshad do //
NK073(pu)005:63: b+ha ga w+aan zhes pa'i sgra las legs pa drug
NK073(pu)005:64: dang ldan pa'i bcom ldana 'adsa te mtshan de gang
NK073(pu)005:65: la brjod pa don yod pa'i rje btsun 'ajama dapala
NK073(pu)005:66: gzhona nu rgyal ba thams cad kyi mkhyen rab kyi
NK073(pu)005:67: bdag po la theg pa thun mong ltar mchod brjod
NK073(pu)005:68: mdzad pa dang / sngags kyi thun mong ma yin
NK073(pu)005:69: pa'i ston pa dang sdud mdzad rdo rje chos sam
NK073(pu)005:70: rdo rje 'dzin pa la gus pa chen pos phyag
NK073(pu)005:71: 'tshal lo zhes rang gi mngon par 'dod pa'i lha
NK073(pu)005:72: la phyag bya ba sngon du btang ste don ldan
NK073(pu)005:73: gyi las la 'jug pa skye bo skyes bu dam
NK073(pu)005:74: pa'i ngang tshul yin pas na de skad gsungs pa'o
NK073(pu)005:75: mdzad pa dang / // 'on kyang 'dus pa ye
NK073(pu)005:76: shes zhabs lugs pa rnams rdo rje chos zhes pa
NK073(pu)005:77: pad+ma gar dbang la mdzad pa mang ngo //
NK073(pu)005:80: brtul zhugs kyi khyad par bshad pa gnyis las /
NK073(pu)005:83: chos 'di pa rnams kyi lta ba bshad pa gnyis /
NK073(pu)005:87: 'jiga rten gyi khamas na semas can phyin ci loga
NK073(pu)005:88: gi lta ba 'dzin pa grangsa meda pa rnams mdora
NK073(pu)005:89: bsdus na rnam pa bzhir 'adu ste /
NK073(pu)005:90: gtso bor ste sa spyad pa phyal pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:94: de bzhi'i dang po gnyis la zhar las byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes kha cig 'chad cing /
NK073(pu)005:95: yang na de dag gi rgyud la'ang 'jig lta lhan skyes yod par 'chad pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:96: de 'dra'i lta ngan gyis gzhi bzung ste /
NK073(pu)005:97: kun brtags kyi bdag 'dzin skye ba de bzhi'i bstan
NK073(pu)005:98: rim la bstan nas go ba'i ched du yin par
NK073(pu)005:101: dang po phyal rgyang gnyis bshad pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:102: de la phyal ba gang zhe na /
NK073(pu)005:103: de ni 'di ltar phung po lngas bsdus kyi chos
NK073(pu)005:104: thamsa cad rgyu gang 'dra ba dang 'bras bu'i khyad
NK073(pu)005:106: 'jig rten pha rol yoda pa dang meda pa gang
NK073(pu)005:107: du'ang dpyad ra med cing ma rtogsa te tshe 'di'i
NK073(pu)005:108: snang ba tur tur po 'di la mngon par dga'
NK073(pu)005:110: skyes bu'i don mthar thug la cang mi sems par kun tu rmongsa pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:111: de'ang phyal ba zhes pa gzhi gyen du 'dzegs pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:112: thur du 'bab pa'i ngos mi mnyam pa med pa'i thang thang po lta bu ste /
NK073(pu)005:113: spang blang gi 'jug ldog la sems pa'i sgo nas
NK073(pu)005:114: 'jig rten phyi ma phan chad kyi don bsgrub cing
NK073(pu)005:115: / 'di ni dge ba'i tshogs te 'dzegs par bya ba dang /
NK073(pu)005:116: 'di ni sdig pa'i g.yang sa ste ltung du dogs
NK073(pu)005:117: pa can no zhes 'dor len byed pa'i bag yod
NK073(pu)005:118: dang bral te / tshe 'di'i bde ba tsam zhig
NK073(pu)005:119: grub pas chog shes shing snang ba bde cham mer
NK073(pu)005:121: rgyang 'phena ni spyir mdo sde nas 'jig rten rgyang
NK073(pu)005:122: 'phen zhes gsungs pa phal cher phyi rol pa spyi
NK073(pu)005:123: ming du bla ma 'ga' zhig 'chad cing /
NK073(pu)005:124: tarka sde lnga'i ya gyal rgyang 'phen zhes pa phur bu ba'i ming yin yang /
NK073(pu)005:125: 'di ni grub mthas blo ma bsgyur ba zhig la mkhas pa rnams bzhed de /
NK073(pu)005:126: de ltar byas na tshe snga phyi dang las rgyu
NK073(pu)005:127: 'bras sogs yod pa'am med pa gang yin du ma
NK073(pu)005:128: rtogsa shinga tshe gcig po 'di la btsan phyug dang
NK073(pu)005:129: mthu stobsa sogs mtho ris kyi dka' ba khyad par
NK073(pu)005:130: can sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'dzin pa ste 'jiga rten
NK073(pu)005:131: gyi drang srong dang lhas bstan pa'i gsang tshiga la
NK073(pu)005:132: brten pa'o // zhes gzhung nas gsal kha byung ba dang yang mthun no //
NK073(pu)005:133: des ni bsam sbyor gyi steng nas 'jig rten pha
NK073(pu)005:134: rol la rtsis mi 'jog par rgyang ring du 'phen
NK073(pu)005:135: pa ltar byed pas na rgyang 'phen zer ba yin
NK073(pu)005:136: no // gnyis pa mur thug dang mu stegs kyi grub mtha' bshad pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:138: sems can gyi phung pos bsdus pa'i chos thamsa cada
NK073(pu)005:139: la bsags pa'i las sngon song gi rgyuda dang shes
NK073(pu)005:140: pa'i rig 'dra snga ma sngon song yod pas sngon
NK073(pu)005:141: gyi mtha' ma dmigs par ma rtogs shing /
NK073(pu)005:142: 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba na 'chi sems tha ma'i
NK073(pu)005:143: 'og tu tshor ba gzhan gyis bsdus pa'i rnam shes
NK073(pu)005:144: kyi rgyun phyi ma 'bras bura 'byung ba dang /
NK073(pu)005:145: der yang bde sdug las kyi rjes su byed pa'i
NK073(pu)005:146: rgyu mtshan gyis phyi ma'i mtha' ma dmigs par 'khor
NK073(pu)005:147: ba srid du gnas pa'i tshul mi shes par ma
NK073(pu)005:148: mthong ba'i rgyu mtshan ltar snang tsam la brten nas
NK073(pu)005:150: las dang de'i rnam smin thams cad med pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:151: spang la sha mong rdol ba ltar tshe gciga la
NK073(pu)005:152: skyes pa'i tshor 'du rnam shes sogs phung po'i chos
NK073(pu)005:153: thamsa cad glo bur du skyes la mtha'a yang chad
NK073(pu)005:154: par lta ba'o // bdag rang bzhin gyis grub pa
NK073(pu)005:155: dang rang rkya thub pa ni 'dis kyang khas len
NK073(pu)005:156: par lta ba'o // mod kyi / de 'dra'i bdag de nyid thog mthar chad par smra ba'o //
NK073(pu)005:157: mu stegsa pa ni chos sam phung po lnga la
NK073(pu)005:158: dbang bsgyur ba po'i bdag don gzhan du 'dzin pa'i
NK073(pu)005:159: rigs gnas kyi lta ba ngan pa gang zhig dmigs
NK073(pu)005:160: pa la dmigs nas rnam pa rtag cig rang dbang
NK073(pu)005:161: can du dam 'cha' ba la chos thamsa cad la
NK073(pu)005:162: kun tu brtagsa pas bdag rtag pa zhig yod par
NK073(pu)005:163: lta ba ste zhes gsungs shing /
NK073(pu)005:164: de la'ang 'grub byed kyi rgyu med pa la grub
NK073(pu)005:165: pa'i 'bras bu bdag 'gyur med cig gdod nas yo
NK073(pu)005:166: par blta ba dang zhes pa gzhan du na rgyu
NK073(pu)005:167: la ma ltos pa'i 'bras bus 'jog tshul med mod
NK073(pu)005:168: kyi / yod pa nyid la grub pa'am 'bras bu zhes btags par rong zom gsungs so //
NK073(pu)005:169: yang snod bcud thams dbang phyug gis byas par smras
NK073(pu)005:170: nas phyugs kyi mchod sbyin la sogs pa dang dbang
NK073(pu)005:171: phyug mnyes par bya ba'i cho gas mtho ris 'dod
NK073(pu)005:172: pa rgyu 'bras kyi blang dor log par 'dzin cing
NK073(pu)005:173: lta ba dang / rgyu ste phung po yongs su
NK073(pu)005:174: 'dzin pa'i byed pa po bdag bden par grub cing
NK073(pu)005:175: rtag pa'i ngo bor yod pa la /
NK073(pu)005:176: de'i 'bras busa phung po rnams ni mi rtag pa'i
NK073(pu)005:177: phyir gtan du ba'i rten gyi ngo bor med par
NK073(pu)005:178: lta ba zhes 'grel byed mkhan 'chad la /
NK073(pu)005:179: lugs de dag rtag lta ba rnams kyi zhe 'dod che long tsam zhig gsung pa ma gtogs /
NK073(pu)005:180: 'dir bstan gyi 'dod tshul gsum phyi rol pa'i grub
NK073(pu)005:181: mtha' mi 'dra ba gsum dang sbyor dgos pa'i nges
NK073(pu)005:183: bdag rtag pa dang dbang phyug byed pa po yin
NK073(pu)005:184: pa gnyis ka 'ug phrug pas khas len pa bzhin
NK073(pu)005:185: no // 'di dag ni srid rtsa gcod pa'i lam
NK073(pu)005:186: yang dag dang ma 'brel bar de kho na nyid
NK073(pu)005:187: la rmongs pa'i ma riga pa phyir zhing brtan par
NK073(pu)005:188: byed pa'i lta ba ngan pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:189: spyir mu stegs can gyi lugs snying po med par
NK073(pu)005:190: sgrub pa'i sgo mtha' med pa zhig yod kyang gtso
NK073(pu)005:191: bo ni gzhung 'dir bshad pa ltar thar lam yang
NK073(pu)005:192: dag dang bral ba'i sgo nas smad pa 'di nyid
NK073(pu)005:193: yin te / mgon po n+aa gardzu nas /
NK073(pu)005:194: gang zag phung po smra ba yi //
NK073(pu)005:196: gos med bcas la gal te zhig /
NK073(pu)005:197: yod med 'das pa smra na dris //
NK073(pu)005:198: zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK073(pu)005:199: gnyis pa la mdor bstan pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:203: chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang //
NK073(pu)005:204: de yi rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang //
NK073(pu)005:205: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te //
NK073(pu)005:206: de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che //
NK073(pu)005:207: zhes gsungs pa ltar sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas pas
NK073(pu)005:208: 'gog pa'i thabs chen po 'jig rten las 'adsa pa'i
NK073(pu)005:209: zag med kyi lam dang nye bar byed pa bden
NK073(pu)005:210: bzhi'i 'jug ldog lhur len gyi gdams ngag gang la
NK073(pu)005:211: yod pa'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
NK073(pu)005:212: tshul / de bshad par bya ba la'ang rnama pa gnyis te /
NK073(pu)005:213: matshana nyid kyi theg pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:215: de ltar gsungs pa ni bden gnyis ji ltar gnas
NK073(pu)005:216: pa'i mtshan nyid dam chos kyi yin lugs dpyis phyin
NK073(pu)005:217: pa de nyid dri ma med pa'i rig pas gtan
NK073(pu)005:218: la 'bebs pa tsam zhig ma gtogs /
NK073(pu)005:219: 'bras bu'i rnam pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas lus longs spyod lam du mi byed pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:220: de las ldog ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi
NK073(pu)005:221: sku'i nga rgyal la brten nas sgo gsum sku gsung
NK073(pu)005:222: thugs su mi phyed par 'ching ba'i khyad par gyis
NK073(pu)005:223: yin no // mtshan nyid theg pa la gsum du mdzad pa thob bya'i sgo nas yin zhing /
NK073(pu)005:224: theg chen la mtshan nyid dang rdo rje'i theg pa
NK073(pu)005:225: gnyis su dbye ba lam sgrub pa'i tshul gyi nang
NK073(pu)005:226: nas gtso bor thabs kyi phyogs rags pa la mi
NK073(pu)005:227: 'dra ba'i khyad zhugs pa'i sgo nas yin pa rgyal
NK073(pu)005:228: dbang dri med 'od zer gyis bzhed pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:231: sngags kyi theg pa'i rnam bzhag gnyis /
NK073(pu)005:234: mtshan nyid kyi theg pa de la'nga thob bya 'bras
NK073(pu)005:235: bu'i mchog dman gyi sgo nas rnama pa gsum du
NK073(pu)005:236: bzhag ste / nyan thosa kyi theg pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:237: ranga sangas rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:238: byang chub semas dpa'i theg pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:239: mthar thug gi thob bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kho nar zad de /
NK073(pu)005:240: de bzhin du theg pa'i mthar thug kyang theg pa
NK073(pu)005:241: chen po kho nar babs pa'i tshul shing rta chen
NK073(pu)005:242: po k+aa ma la sh+ai las dbu ma snang bar
NK073(pu)005:243: bsgrub pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
NK073(pu)005:244: 'on kyang gdul bya'i bsam pa'i dbang gis re zhig theg pa gsum du gsungs pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:246: sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu rtogs bya'i phyir //
NK073(pu)005:247: thabs 'di rang byung gis ni mdzad gyur gyi //
NK073(pu)005:248: de dag rnams la khyed cag sangs rgyas su //
NK073(pu)005:249: 'gyur ro zhes na nam yang mi gsung ngo //
NK073(pu)005:250: ci phyir zhe na skyob pa dus la gzigs //
NK073(pu)005:255: byang sems kyi theg pa bshad pa gsum las dang po ni /
NK073(pu)005:256: de la nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugsa pa
NK073(pu)005:257: rnams kyi zhes pa'i nyan thos kyi theg par zhugs
NK073(pu)005:258: mtshams ni 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gang du skyes kyang
NK073(pu)005:259: 'phags pa rnams dang nye bar mi mi mthun pa'i
NK073(pu)005:260: mtshan nyid nad dang 'bras dang zug rngu ltar mthong
NK073(pu)005:261: bas yid byung ste rang gi don du nyan thos
NK073(pu)005:262: kyi byang chub thob par 'dod pa'i 'dun pa bcos
NK073(pu)005:263: min nam skyes pa nas theg pa der zhugs par
NK073(pu)005:264: 'jog cing / de'ang yid smon tsam zhig gis rang
NK073(pu)005:265: 'bras 'grub pa mi srid par shes nas dang por
NK073(pu)005:266: srid pa'i rgud pa mtha' dag gi rtsa ba 'jig
NK073(pu)005:267: lta'i rming la thug par mthong zhing /
NK073(pu)005:268: de ldog pa la de dang 'dzin stangs dngos 'gal
NK073(pu)005:269: du song ba'i bdag med rtog pa'i ye shes khyad
NK073(pu)005:270: par can zhig skyes pa dgos so //
NK073(pu)005:271: de la bdag med kyi lta ba ci 'dra zhig dgos pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:272: phung po lnga'i chos thamsa cad la mu stegsa pa
NK073(pu)005:273: zhes pa smos ma thag pa'i mur thug gi zlas
NK073(pu)005:274: drangs pa'i de la dgongs shing /
NK073(pu)005:275: la sogsa pa'i khongs nas mur thug dang phyal rgyang gnyis 'thon te /
NK073(pu)005:276: de rnams kyis sgro dang skura pasa kun tu brtagas
NK073(pu)005:277: pa'i ye nas meda pa chad pa'i lta ba dang
NK073(pu)005:278: / rtag par lta ba la sogsa pa ste yan
NK073(pu)005:279: lag dang bcas pa zhes gsungs pa'i tshig zur snga
NK073(pu)005:280: ma ni rtag chad du lta ba'i lta ngan ye
NK073(pu)005:281: nas med par bstan pa min gyi /
NK073(pu)005:282: lta ngan de dag gi zhen yul rtag chad kyi mtha' gnyis ye med du bstan pa yin no //
NK073(pu)005:283: de 'dra'i rtag chad kyi mtha' gnyis yoda para lta ba ni log shes yin te /
NK073(pu)005:284: des ji ltar bzung ba bzhin du ma grub pa'i phyir te /
NK073(pu)005:285: thaga pa la sbrul du mthong ba bzhina no snyam
NK073(pu)005:286: du tshad mas drang ba'i nges shes rnyed nas lta
NK073(pu)005:287: ba ngan pa'i g.yang sar mi 'jug go //
NK073(pu)005:288: gong gi ye med ces pas dngos po de'i bdag
NK073(pu)005:289: nyid du ma grub par bstan cing skabs 'dir med
NK073(pu)005:290: de zhes gsungs pa ni de ltar med par tshul
NK073(pu)005:291: bzhin yid la byed pa'i don yin pas zlos skyon
NK073(pu)005:292: sel te / 'og tu rnam par shes pas don dam du yod par lta zhing /
NK073(pu)005:293: zhes pa'i thad kyi lta zhing gi tshig ni 'dir yang sbyar rgyur shin tu gsal ba'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:294: tshig de dag gis rtag gcig rang dbang ba'i bdag yod pa sel du zin kyang /
NK073(pu)005:295: rang rkya thub pa'i rdzas yod kyis stong pa'i gang
NK073(pu)005:296: zag gi bdag med rtogs dgos pa ma bstan no
NK073(pu)005:297: zhe na / de 'dra'i lus sems gang la'ang ma
NK073(pu)005:298: ltos pa'i gang zag yod 'dzin cig 'thad do snyam
NK073(pu)005:299: pa kun brtags yin pas de'ang de'i khongs su 'gog
NK073(pu)005:300: dgos par ma bstan pa min no //
NK073(pu)005:301: de ltar gang zag gi bdag med rtogs kyang da
NK073(pu)005:302: dung chos kyi bdag med ma rtogs pa ma zad
NK073(pu)005:303: / chos kyi bdag yod 'dzin 'thad ldan du blta ba'i tshul /
NK073(pu)005:304: phung po dang khamsa dang skye mcheda la sogsa pa'i rtsom gzhi /
NK073(pu)005:305: 'dod na dbang po med pa dang //
NK073(pu)005:306: sgra med phra rab rdul rdzas brgyad //
NK073(pu)005:307: ces gsungs pa ltar 'byung ba chen po sa chu
NK073(pu)005:308: me rlung bzhi'i rdul phra rab sogs rdul phran cha
NK073(pu)005:309: med dang / rnam par shes pa skad cig cha
NK073(pu)005:310: med ni don dam par yod par ram don dam
NK073(pu)005:311: bden par lta zhing zhes 'chad dgos kyi /
NK073(pu)005:312: don dam dpyod pa'i ngor yod cing don dam bden
NK073(pu)005:313: pa yin mi dgos pa lta bu la byar mi
NK073(pu)005:314: rung ste / rags rim tsam mo //
NK073(pu)005:315: de ltar gsungs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang bye smra'i grub mtha' /
NK073(pu)005:316: rang rgyal gyi theg pa dang sems tsam pa'i grub mtha' /
NK073(pu)005:317: byang sems kyi theg pa dang dbu ma pa'i grub
NK073(pu)005:318: mtha' rnams rnam bzhag tsam gyi sgo nas sbyar te
NK073(pu)005:319: 'chad par dgongs pa'i tshul rje btsun byams pa'i man
NK073(pu)005:321: lta ba'i gnad de 'dra zhig nges par byas nas
NK073(pu)005:322: nyams su len tshul tshang la ma nor ba ni
NK073(pu)005:323: nad shes par bya ba sogs kyi dpes bstan pa
NK073(pu)005:324: ltar sdug bsngal shes par bya ba dang kun 'byung
NK073(pu)005:325: spang bar bya ba la sogs pa kun nyon phyogs
NK073(pu)005:326: kyi skye rim dang rnam par byang ba'i 'jug tshul
NK073(pu)005:327: nges pa'i ched du bde bar gshegs pas 'phagsa pa'i
NK073(pu)005:328: bdena pa bzhi gsungs pa de dag la de ltar
NK073(pu)005:329: spang blang ma nor ba'i lam bsgoma pasa rim gyis
NK073(pu)005:330: 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi po mngon pa gong ma
NK073(pu)005:331: ltar na sbyor lam stan gcig pa nas 'phags pa
NK073(pu)005:332: rigs nas rigs skye'i bar gyi rgyun zhugs pa dang
NK073(pu)005:333: 'bras gnas / de nyid kyi phyi ma'i phyogs gcig
NK073(pu)005:334: nas 'dod nyon dgu pa ma spang pa'i bar phyir
NK073(pu)005:336: phyi ma khyad par can nas 'dod khams kyi sgom
NK073(pu)005:337: spangs dgu pa spangs pa'i bar gyi phyir mi 'ong
NK073(pu)005:339: de'i nang nas phyi ma khyad par ba dang srid
NK073(pu)005:340: rtse'i nyon mongs dgu pa spang pa'i bar dgra bcom
NK073(pu)005:342: zhugs 'bras te / da dung thod rgal dang cig
NK073(pu)005:343: char ba'i rnam bzhag sogs spros pas chog go //
NK073(pu)005:344: de 'dra'i rang gi 'bras bu gtso bor 'phags pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa rnams 'grub pa yina no //
NK073(pu)005:346: ranga sangsa rgyas kyi byang chub la 'dun pa'i sgo
NK073(pu)005:347: nas de'i thega pa la zhugsa pa'i gang zag dam
NK073(pu)005:348: pa rnams kyi lta ba ni /
NK073(pu)005:349: chos thamsa cad la mu stegsa pa la sogs pasa
NK073(pu)005:350: med la yod par sgro 'dogs dang yod la med
NK073(pu)005:351: par skur pa'i blos kun tu brtagsa pa'i badga rtag
NK073(pu)005:352: pa la sogas pa med para lta ba nyan thos
NK073(pu)005:353: dang mthun zhing / de las khyad par du byed pa'i chos ni dbyig gnyen zhabs kyis /
NK073(pu)005:354: drug gi cig char sbyar ba na //
NK073(pu)005:355: phra rab rdul cha drug tu 'gyur //
NK073(pu)005:356: drug po dag ni go gcig na //
NK073(pu)005:357: gong bu'am rdul phran tsam du 'gyur //
NK073(pu)005:358: zhes gsungs pa bzhin phyi rol gyi don 'gogs pa'i
NK073(pu)005:359: gtan tshigs la brten nas gzugas kyi phung po dang
NK073(pu)005:360: gzugs can gyi skye mched bcu dang khams bcu dang
NK073(pu)005:361: chos khams kyi phyogsa gcig ste rnam rig min pa'i
NK073(pu)005:362: gzugs rnams la bdag med par rtogsa shinga /
NK073(pu)005:363: zhes pa tsam las rong zom 'grel par mi gsal la /
NK073(pu)005:364: don du de dag gis mtshon pa'i shes bya rnam
NK073(pu)005:365: par shes pa las don gzhan du gyur pa 'ga'
NK073(pu)005:366: yang med par rtogs pa'i don no //
NK073(pu)005:367: de'ang chos thams cad la zhes sogs kyis gang zag gi bdag med dang /
NK073(pu)005:368: de las khyad par du sogs kyis rnal 'byor spyod
NK073(pu)005:369: gzhung nas bshad pa'i chos kyi bdag med bstan pa'o
NK073(pu)005:370: // de 'dra'i bdag med gnyis rtogs kyi shes rab
NK073(pu)005:371: ni nyan thos las spags pa'iranga rgyal gyi che ba'o
NK073(pu)005:373: theg pa 'di pa rnams la ming de ltar brjod pa rgyu mtshan ci la brten zhe na /
NK073(pu)005:374: de dag rten gang la ranga byang chub kyi 'bras
NK073(pu)005:375: bu thob pa'i srid pa tha ma'i dus na'ang 'ang
NK073(pu)005:376: gi don la spro rgyu mang /
NK073(pu)005:377: nyan thos ltar dge pa'i bshesa gnyen la mi ltos
NK073(pu)005:378: par sngon gomsa pa'i shugsa te bskal pa brgyar 'du
NK073(pu)005:379: byas pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mthus /
NK073(pu)005:380: rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams ma byung zhing //
NK073(pu)005:381: nyan thos rnams kyang zad pa na //
NK073(pu)005:382: rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni //
NK073(pu)005:383: brten pa med par rab tu skye //
NK073(pu)005:384: zhes dpal n+aa gardzu nas gsungs pa ltar rang gi
NK073(pu)005:385: shes rab kyi stobs kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
NK073(pu)005:386: ba yana lag bcu gnyis rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam
NK073(pu)005:387: par 'gyur bas rtag par ma yin pa dang rgyu
NK073(pu)005:388: nyid kyi rigs 'dra 'bras bur smin pas chad par
NK073(pu)005:389: ma yin pa nyid du shes nas sngon dang phyi
NK073(pu)005:390: ma'i mtha' la rmongs pa bzlog ste /
NK073(pu)005:391: de'i tshul gyi sgo nas chos nyid zab mo'i don
NK073(pu)005:392: rtogsa nas rang byang chub kyi 'brasa bu len pa
NK073(pu)005:393: med par zag pa zad cing shes sgrib kyi phyogs
NK073(pu)005:394: gcig las rnam par grol bar 'thob pa yin no
NK073(pu)005:395: // yang rong 'grel du rang rgyal gyi grub mtha'
NK073(pu)005:396: mdo sde pa dang sbyar ba 'dra ba zhig kyang
NK073(pu)005:397: // gsungs 'dug la / da dung thal 'gyur ba
NK073(pu)005:398: rang lugs la nyan rang rnams kyis bdag med gnyis
NK073(pu)005:399: yongs su rdzogs par rtogs ma rtogs kyi dpyad pa
NK073(pu)005:400: byed na sa dge'i mkhas pa rnams kyi zhe 'dod
NK073(pu)005:401: // gsungs 'dug la / dang / kho bo'i bla
NK073(pu)005:402: ma bdag nyid chen po dag gi bzhed tshul ji
NK073(pu)005:403: ltar yin pa rnams zhib tu brtags pas rtogs par
NK073(pu)005:404: // gsungs 'dug la / dang / nus shing / gzhan yang spro bya mang ngo //
NK073(pu)005:406: chos kyi rgyal po rig 'dzin 'jigs med gling pa'i
NK073(pu)005:407: zhal snga nas byang chub sems dpa' sngags kyi theg
NK073(pu)005:408: pa la / zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar phar phyin
NK073(pu)005:409: dang sngags kyi theg pa gnyis ka byang chub semsa
NK073(pu)005:410: dpa'i thega pa yin mod kyi /
NK073(pu)005:411: 'dir ni sngags kyi theg pa'i zlas drangs pa phar phyin gyi theg pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:412: de la snying rje chen pos drangs pa'i byang chub
NK073(pu)005:413: kyi sems bcos min rgyud la skyes pa'i sgo nas
NK073(pu)005:414: zhugsa pa rnams kyi zab mos lta ba ci 'dra
NK073(pu)005:416: 'khor ba kun nasa nyon mongas pa dang myang 'das
NK073(pu)005:417: rnama para byang ba'i phyogs kyi chosa thams cada dona
NK073(pu)005:418: dama para yod med dam btags don 'tshol ba'i 'thad
NK073(pu)005:419: pas brtags na ni rdul cha tsam yang rnyed pa
NK073(pu)005:420: med de / gcig du bral yang rten 'brel chen
NK073(pu)005:421: mo la sogs pa'i rig pa'i 'gros kyis de ltar
NK073(pu)005:423: de'ang ming gis btags pa tsam gyi shes bya rtog
NK073(pu)005:424: pa'i rang mdangs su shar ba zhig min par yul
NK073(pu)005:425: de'i rang steng nas tshugs thub tu grub pa rdul
NK073(pu)005:426: tsam yang med pas bden pa gnyis gang gi dbang
NK073(pu)005:427: du byas kyang ranga bzhina gyis grub pa'i chos ni
NK073(pu)005:428: rnam pa thams cad du mada do zhes 'chad dgos
NK073(pu)005:429: kyi don dam par rang bzhin med la /
NK073(pu)005:430: rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni tha snyad kyi 'jog
NK073(pu)005:431: tshul tsam zhig yin no zhes phyin ci log smra
NK073(pu)005:432: bar mi bya ba la dgongs nas kun mkhyen bla
NK073(pu)005:433: mas kyang / grub mtha' mdzod kyi thal 'gyur ba'i rnam bzhag mdzad skabs /
NK073(pu)005:434: bden pa gnyis kyi dbye gzhi rang bzhin med pa la gsungs pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:435: bdag nyid chen po sh+aan+ta pu ri bas kyang /
NK073(pu)005:436: snang tsam de las yul gyi steng nyid du //
NK073(pu)005:437: grub pa'i ngo bo rdul tsam ma mchis kyang //
NK073(pu)005:438: zhes pa la sogs pa mang du gsungs so //
NK073(pu)005:439: des na lugs 'dir rang bzhin gyis grub pa tha snyad du yang med pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:440: don dam par grub pa tha snyad du'ang med pa don gcig yin la /
NK073(pu)005:441: kun rdzob tu ni sgyu ma dang rmi lam bzhin
NK073(pu)005:442: blos bzhag pa tsam du bya byed rgyu 'bras thams
NK073(pu)005:443: cad so so'i mtshan nyid ma 'dres par yod de
NK073(pu)005:444: / de med na don dam bden pa dang tha
NK073(pu)005:445: snyad bden pa gnyis gcig grogs su gcig 'gro ba
NK073(pu)005:447: sgyu ma dang rmi lam sogs kyi dpe ni der
NK073(pu)005:448: snang dang des stong gi sgo nas 'jog par sna
NK073(pu)005:449: nam ye shes sdes lhag mthong chen mo la sogs
NK073(pu)005:451: skabs 'di la ni bshad bya mtha' yas kyang re zhig mi spro'o //
NK073(pu)005:452: de lta bu'i bdag med kyi lta ba de sbyin
NK073(pu)005:453: sogs thab kyi cha du mas khyad par du byas
NK073(pu)005:454: te / mdor na tshogs gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i pha
NK073(pu)005:455: rola tu phyin pa bcu'i nyams len la spyad pa'i
NK073(pu)005:456: 'brasa bu'am lag rjes ni rab tu dga' ba la
NK073(pu)005:457: sogs pa'i sa bcu rim gyis bgrod pa'i mathara bla
NK073(pu)005:458: na med pa'i byang chuba tu 'grub par 'dod pa
NK073(pu)005:461: kun rdzob de nyid gshog yangs dkar po rgyas gyur pa //
NK073(pu)005:462: ngang pa'i rgyal po de ni skye bo'i ngang pa yis //
NK073(pu)005:463: mdun du bdar nas dge ba'i rlung gi stobs shugs kyis //
NK073(pu)005:464: rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol mchog tu 'gro //
NK073(pu)005:466: phar phyin bcu'i 'bras bu sa bcur gsungs pa ni
NK073(pu)005:467: bskyed bya skyed byed kyi rgyu 'bras su bsdu dgos
NK073(pu)005:468: par snang bas phar phyin snga ma snga mas phyi
NK073(pu)005:469: ma phyi ma'i yon tan skyed pa la bya'o //
NK073(pu)005:473: spyir gsang sngags thabs kyis che ba'i theg pa zhes brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan ni /
NK073(pu)005:474: rdo rje theg pa zhes pa'i mtshan don las shes nus te /
NK073(pu)005:475: rong zom 'grel par gsang sngags kyi gzhung rnams las phung po rnams la rdo rje phung po dang /
NK073(pu)005:476: skye mched rnams la rdo rje skye mched ces bya ste /
NK073(pu)005:477: sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta bu'i lha'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs shing /
NK073(pu)005:478: thabs kyis che zhes pa'i thabs kyang de yin pa'i phyir te /
NK073(pu)005:480: ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
NK073(pu)005:481: mnga' bdag dpe byad brgyad cur ldan //
NK073(pu)005:482: de phyir thabs des bsgrub bya ste //
NK073(pu)005:483: thabs ni ston pa'i gzugs can no //
NK073(pu)005:485: sngags su gsungs pa'i zab mo 'od gsal gyi ye shes dang /
NK073(pu)005:486: rgyas pa zur 'jug gi sku sgrub tshul rim pa
NK073(pu)005:487: gnyis ka'i sgo nas phar phyin las 'phags chos yod
NK073(pu)005:488: mod kyi / de ni sngags bla med kho na'i
NK073(pu)005:489: yin gyi rdo rje theg pa gang rung rung gi
NK073(pu)005:490: mod kyi / min no // rdo rje theg pa
NK073(pu)005:491: la sgra bshad lugs mi 'dra ba khungs thub kyi
NK073(pu)005:492: gzhung nas byung ba gzhan yanga yod la /
NK073(pu)005:493: gang ltar yang de 'dra'i sngags kyi theg pa la dbye ba byas na rnam pa gsum mo //
NK073(pu)005:494: 'ang sgra dang mdo sngags gnyis kyi snga ma la gsum yod par ma zad /
NK073(pu)005:495: phyi ma la'ang gsum du phye ste /
NK073(pu)005:497: gsum po de gang zhe na /
NK073(pu)005:498: bya ba'i rgyud kyi thega pa dang //
NK073(pu)005:499: gnyis ka'i rgyud kyi theg pa dang //
NK073(pu)005:501: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi khongs su sngags bla med kyi rgyud rnams kyang bsdus pa yin te /
NK073(pu)005:503: 'di'i skabs kyi theg pa zhes gsungs pa rnams ni
NK073(pu)005:504: rgyud sde de dang de nas bshad pa'i lam rnams
NK073(pu)005:505: la bya yi gong smos kyi theg pa'i dbye lugs
NK073(pu)005:506: gnyis po gang rung ni mi bya ste /
NK073(pu)005:507: de ltar byas na mtha' thon pa mi 'ong ngo //
NK073(pu)005:511: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rnam par bzhag pa gsum las /
NK073(pu)005:513: de la bya ba'i rgyud la zhugs shing chu cod
NK073(pu)005:514: pan gyi dbang thob pa ni de'i thega pa la'ang
NK073(pu)005:516: de rnams kyi lta ba ste shes rab khyad par
NK073(pu)005:517: can gyis gang zhig rtogs nas bsgom par bya ba
NK073(pu)005:518: ni / zhes pa'am yang na de dag gis ji ltar blta ba ni /
NK073(pu)005:519: zhes rang nyid lhar bsgom pa la rang lhar blta zhes pa bzhin no //
NK073(pu)005:520: skabs 'dir snang ba lhar sgrub kyi dpyad pa 'dod
NK073(pu)005:521: na rong zom zhabs kyis snang ba lhar bsgrub pa'i
NK073(pu)005:522: bstan bcos dang / kun mkhyen bla ma'i rgyud 'grel
NK073(pu)005:523: phyogs bcu mun sel la sogs pa blta bar bya
NK073(pu)005:524: bstan bcos dang / la / lhar sgrub lugs la
NK073(pu)005:525: rong klong gnyis bzhed pa mi 'dra ba cung zad
NK073(pu)005:526: snang ste gzhan las shes so //
NK073(pu)005:527: bya ba'i rgyud kyi don rnams ni rgya cher slob
NK073(pu)005:528: dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas bshad pa ltar lha drug
NK073(pu)005:530: bsam gtan gsum sogs mang du yod kyang /
NK073(pu)005:532: dona dama para chos thams cad skye 'gag med pa
NK073(pu)005:533: mtha' bral dbu ma'i gshis su mnyam par bzhag ste
NK073(pu)005:534: / de'i ngang lasa kun rdzoba tu lha'i gzugsa mtshan
NK073(pu)005:535: dang dpe byad kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i
NK073(pu)005:536: / skur bsgoma zhing / sku'i gzugsa brnyan gsal ba dang /
NK073(pu)005:537: thugsa kyi mtshan ma phyag mtshan 'dzin pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:538: gsung bzlas brjod kyi rnal 'byor bya ba dang /
NK073(pu)005:539: grogs su khrus dang gtsang sbra la gnas pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:540: bzlas brjod kyi dus dang dus ma yin pa'i sa tshiga dang /
NK073(pu)005:541: gaza'a dang rgyu skar shis pa la sogas pa gtso
NK073(pu)005:542: bor phyi'i bya ba mod la brten cing yo byad
NK073(pu)005:543: dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu rkyen tshogsa pa'i mathu
NK073(pu)005:544: las thun mong dang mchog gi grub pa rnams 'grub
NK073(pu)005:545: pa'o // sku'i gzugs brnyan zhes pa 'di che long
NK073(pu)005:546: tsam du na sku ltar snang ba zhes pa'i don
NK073(pu)005:547: yin pas lha'i rnal 'byor dang por bsgom pa'i dus
NK073(pu)005:548: su rigs gsum la sogs pa'i sku'i gsal snang de
NK073(pu)005:549: don spyi'i gsal snang tsam zhig yin pa la dgongs
NK073(pu)005:550: pa'o // pa 'dra ste / k+aa ma la sh+ai
NK073(pu)005:551: las sgom rim tha mar rnam par mi rtog pa'i
NK073(pu)005:552: gzugs brnyan la sogs pas gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK073(pu)005:554: gnyis ka'i rgyud ces pa phyi'i bya ba dang nang
NK073(pu)005:555: gi rnal 'byor gnyis ka cha mnyam par spyod pa'i
NK073(pu)005:556: don te / de 'dra'i ming 'jug pa'i spyod rgyud
NK073(pu)005:557: kyi thega pa la zhugsa pa rnamas kyi lta ba
NK073(pu)005:558: don te / ni / dona dama para skye 'agga
NK073(pu)005:559: gnyis su meda pa lasa kuna rdzoba tu zla ba
NK073(pu)005:560: la gnas pa'i +aam las rnam par snang mdzad kyi
NK073(pu)005:561: lha'i gzugsa kyi sku bsgom par rgyud nas gsungs pa
NK073(pu)005:562: don te / ni / ltar bya zhing / bdag gi de nyid dang /
NK073(pu)005:564: bzlas brjod kyi de nyid dang /
NK073(pu)005:565: bsam gtan gyi de nyid de rnam pa bzhi'am /
NK073(pu)005:566: yang na bzlas brjod yan chad kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams gong gi tshig des bstan la /
NK073(pu)005:570: gzhi la gzhol ba gnyis te bzhi dang ldan para sgom pa'i ting nge 'dzina no //
NK073(pu)005:571: gzhan yang yo byad dang spyod lam la'ang mi ltos
NK073(pu)005:572: pa min pas phyi'i rgyu tshogs dang nang gi rgyu
NK073(pu)005:573: rkyen rnal 'byor dang la sogas pa'i khongs nas 'don
NK073(pu)005:574: rgyu ni gtsang sbra sogs kyi spyod lam du byas
NK073(pu)005:575: na bde zhing gnyisa ka zhes pa phyi dang nang
NK073(pu)005:577: de dag la brten pa lasa 'bras bu 'grub pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:578: zad par sngon po grub pa na nyer spyad dkar
NK073(pu)005:579: po'i kha dog can yang rnal 'byor gyi mthus dngos
NK073(pu)005:580: su sngon por bsgyur nus pa ltar /
NK073(pu)005:581: lha'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyi gsal snang nus ldan
NK073(pu)005:582: du song ba las dag pa'i sku dngos gnas su
NK073(pu)005:583: 'grub pa'o // de'ang phyogs lha sku'i rnal 'byor la /
NK073(pu)005:584: bya rgyud kyi tshe rang lhar sgom pa yod med dang /
NK073(pu)005:585: stong phyogs de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor la /
NK073(pu)005:586: phyi rgyud du rdzoogs rim yod med kyi zer lugs mang po snang yang /
NK073(pu)005:587: bya ba'i rgyud mtshan nyid pa la ni nges par rang lhar sgom pa dgos te /
NK073(pu)005:588: slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas rdo rje gtsug tor de'i khungs su drangs pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:589: bya rgyud tsam po ba la rang lhar mi sgom pa'i gsal kha bud+d+ha gu h+yas ma mdzad kyang /
NK073(pu)005:590: kun mkhyen bla ma yab sras bzhed do //
NK073(pu)005:591: 'on kyang kun mkhyen gyis bya rgyud la tsam khyad
NK073(pu)005:592: kyi dbye ba mdzad pa ni de ltar dngos btags
NK073(pu)005:594: bsam gtan dang po la tsam khyad phye ba bzhin du mi bzung ngo //
NK073(pu)005:595: de'i bzhed pas mkhan po zhi ba 'tsho'i sman bla'i
NK073(pu)005:596: mdo chog kyang bya rgyud du yod bsdus kyi tshul
NK073(pu)005:598: de nyams su len pa la chu cod pan gyi
NK073(pu)005:599: dbang bskur sogs sngon du 'gro mi dgos pas bya
NK073(pu)005:600: rgyud dngos kyang min par byed dgos te /
NK073(pu)005:602: gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sku lus kyis //
NK073(pu)005:603: zhes sogs gsungs pa rnams kyang mdo sngags la 'jug
NK073(pu)005:604: mtshams yin zhes mang zhig smra bar snang ba dang
NK073(pu)005:605: 'dra'o // rdzogs rim ni srog d+hu tir bcing ba'i
NK073(pu)005:606: rnal 'byor gyi steng nas 'jog pas de phyi rgyud
NK073(pu)005:608: 'dir de'i dod du mtshan bcas dang mtshan med kyi
NK073(pu)005:609: rnal 'byor gnyis 'jog pa rgya gar gyi chen po
NK073(pu)005:611: gsum pa la bstan bshad gnyis kyi /
NK073(pu)005:613: rnal 'byora rgyuda kyi rjes su 'brangs shing de'i thega
NK073(pu)005:614: pa la zhugsa pa rnams kyi lta ba ni rnama
NK073(pu)005:615: pa gnyis te / rnal 'byor phyi pa thub pa
NK073(pu)005:616: rgyud kyi theg pa dang zhes pa rong 'grel du
NK073(pu)005:617: dka' thub grub pa drang srong mes dang mtshungs par
NK073(pu)005:618: gtsang sbra la sogs pa byed pa'i don du sbyar
NK073(pu)005:619: pa gnyis te / zhing / gtsang ston 'grel par /
NK073(pu)005:620: nang gi rnal 'byor gtso bor byed pa'i sgo nas
NK073(pu)005:621: ma dag pa'i snang zhen thub par byed pa'i phyir
NK073(pu)005:622: zhes zer ro // de'i zlas drangs pa'i rnal 'byor
NK073(pu)005:623: nang pa thabsa kyi rgyud de rim pa gnyis kyis
NK073(pu)005:625: de gnyis la phyi dang nang zhes pa'i khyad 'byed
NK073(pu)005:626: byed ni gtsang ston gyi gsung na mang po zhig
NK073(pu)005:627: 'dus kyang mi 'thad pa'i cha 'ga' re snang la
NK073(pu)005:628: / gnyis sbyor gyi chags pa lam du byed mi
NK073(pu)005:629: byed las bzhag pa sogs 'thad ldan yang snang ngo
NK073(pu)005:631: lta spyod gnyis kyi sgo nas bzhag kyang ha cang zhal gsal po mi 'dug la /
NK073(pu)005:632: don du rim pa gnyis kyi lam nas chos gzugs
NK073(pu)005:633: kyi sku'i sgrub tshul thar thug yod med kyi khyad
NK073(pu)005:634: par ste / bla med rgyud nas bshad pa'i lam
NK073(pu)005:635: thun mong cig la ma bsten par lam gzhan ci
NK073(pu)005:636: 'dra zhig gis kyang bla na med pa'i ye shes
NK073(pu)005:638: de'i gnad kyang gzhi la yod pa'i 'od gsal rnam mkhyen du song ba dang /
NK073(pu)005:639: de'i ngo bo nyid kyi gzugs sku kha sbyor yan
NK073(pu)005:640: lag bdun ldan lam du byed pa ni bla med
NK073(pu)005:641: rgyud kho na'i dgongs pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:642: de 'dra'i sku gnyis las gzhan pa'i thob bya mthar thug kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:643: lha'i rnal 'byor dang dag rdzogs smin gsum tshang ba'i
NK073(pu)005:644: lha'i rnal 'byor la khyab che chung byung ba'ang rgyu
NK073(pu)005:645: mtshan de nyid kyi phyir yin no //
NK073(pu)005:648: bla med rgyud kyi rnam bzhag gnyis //
NK073(pu)005:650: de la rnala 'byor phyi pa thub pa'i rgyud kyi
NK073(pu)005:651: theg pa la zhugsa pa rnamas kyi lta ba ni
NK073(pu)005:652: / phyi'i bya ba mang po dang yo byad la
NK073(pu)005:653: gtso bora mi 'dzina cing nang gi rnal 'byor khyad
NK073(pu)005:654: par can rnam byang chen mo'i tshul gyis rgyal sras
NK073(pu)005:655: srid pa tha ma pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
NK073(pu)005:656: rgya ba'i rnam pa dang mthun par mngon byang lnga
NK073(pu)005:657: bskyed la sogs pa de nyid bsdus pa dang rdo
NK073(pu)005:658: rje rtse mo sogs nas gsungs pa bzhin byed do
NK073(pu)005:659: / // de'ang 'di ltar dona dam para skye 'aggas
NK073(pu)005:660: meda pa'i rang bzhin can gyi lha dang lha mo
NK073(pu)005:661: phan tshun 'khyud pa'i bde bas dgyings pa'i rnam can
NK073(pu)005:662: / // du bsgom zhing / de ltar lus 'ja'
NK073(pu)005:663: tshon lta bu'i lha'i sku bsgom par ma zad de
NK073(pu)005:664: dang 'dra ba'i bden med kyi lta ba phul du
NK073(pu)005:665: byung bas rgyud yongas su daga par sgrub pa'i ting
NK073(pu)005:666: nge 'dzina gyis rab tu bzung ba'i 'phagsa pa'i gzugsa
NK073(pu)005:667: kyi sku phyag rgya bzhi dang ldana para bsgom pa'i
NK073(pu)005:668: rnal 'byora gtso bora byasa pa lasa 'gruba pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:672: rnala 'byora nanga pa thabsa kyi rgyud kyi theg pa
NK073(pu)005:673: la zhugsa pa rnamas kyi lta ba ni dbye na
NK073(pu)005:677: rdzogas pa chena po'i tshul lo //
NK073(pu)005:679: 'di ni mnyam sbyor du gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
NK073(pu)005:681: shin tu rnal 'byor gsum dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rnal
NK073(pu)005:682: 'byor cha tshang zhig la rdzogs par byed pa ltar
NK073(pu)005:683: mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i bskyed rim dang /
NK073(pu)005:684: zab cing rgya che ba'i rdzogs rim gnyis po gang la'ang tshang ba re dgos par mngon no //
NK073(pu)005:686: tshul gsum spyir bshad pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:687: de la 'jug pa'i sgo bye brag tu bshad pa ste gnyis las /
NK073(pu)005:691: rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul gsum las /
NK073(pu)005:693: de la bskyed pa'i tshul ni /
NK073(pu)005:695: spyir bskyed rdzogs kyi 'jog lugs mchog tu gyur pa
NK073(pu)005:696: ni rlung dbang bsgyur zhugs gnas thim gsum byas stobs
NK073(pu)005:697: kyis drangs pa'i brtan pa'i ye shes zhig dang /
NK073(pu)005:698: de las ldog pa bcom pa'i ye shes sngags bla
NK073(pu)005:699: med kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor du
NK073(pu)005:701: de gnyis kyi sgo nas byed pa lo chen d+harma
NK073(pu)005:702: sh+r+ai sogs rang lugs kyi mkhas pa dag kyang bzhed
NK073(pu)005:703: la / kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i dbang po yab sras
NK073(pu)005:704: kyi gzhung na snang phyogs dang stong phyogs kyi lha'i
NK073(pu)005:705: rnal 'byor gsang sngags bla med kyi dbang du byas
NK073(pu)005:706: pa gnyis la bskyed rdzogs kyi ming 'dogs mdzad pa
NK073(pu)005:708: 'dir gsungs pa'i bskyed rdzogs ni 'jog tshul de gnyis gang rung nas bzhag pa min gyi /
NK073(pu)005:709: lha gcig gi bskyed rim la'ang /
NK073(pu)005:710: ting 'dzin rnam gsum yan chad bskyed pa'i tshul dang /
NK073(pu)005:711: de las bskyed pa'i lha sku bzhin lag gi rnam
NK073(pu)005:712: can sku'i cha shas yongs su rdzogs par sgom pa
NK073(pu)005:714: sgyu 'phrul gyi le'u brgyad pa nas 'byung ba ltar lus dkyil sgom zhing /
NK073(pu)005:715: de thams cad rang gi rdo rje phung po'i yan
NK073(pu)005:716: lag tu nges par bya ba rjogs pa chen po'i
NK073(pu)005:717: tshul yin no zhes kho bo de ltar sems so
NK073(pu)005:718: // rgya gar ba'i chen po rnams kyi gzhung na
NK073(pu)005:719: mi 'dra yang don mi mthun pa de 'dra shin
NK073(pu)005:720: // tu mang ste / spros pas chog go //
NK073(pu)005:721: de bzhin du chos kyi rgyal po klong chen pa'i
NK073(pu)005:722: gzhung du rdzus skyes kyi mi dang skyed tshul mthun
NK073(pu)005:723: pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor sngags bla med thun mong gi
NK073(pu)005:724: dbang du mdzad pa zhig gsungs pa la bla med
NK073(pu)005:725: rang lam gyi tshogs lam pa rtogs pa na 'phar
NK073(pu)005:727: sbyor lam yan chad kyi rgyud tshod du song ba'i
NK073(pu)005:728: skabs shig ste gnas kyi skabs sgo nas gnyis su
NK073(pu)005:729: yod pa ni bcos ma dang brtan pa'i rnal 'byor
NK073(pu)005:730: gyi khyad par las yin no //
NK073(pu)005:731: de'i nang nas phyi ma ni rdzogs rim thun mong
NK073(pu)005:732: ma yin pa'i ye shes kyi sku sgrub tshul yin
NK073(pu)005:733: zhing / de ni gsang snying las /
NK073(pu)005:734: gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni //
NK073(pu)005:735: pho mo ma yin ma ning min //
NK073(pu)005:736: mtshan med ma yin rigs brgyud min //
NK073(pu)005:737: kha dog ma yin dbyibs su min //
NK073(pu)005:738: de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te //
NK073(pu)005:739: thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu //
NK073(pu)005:740: zhes pa la sogs pa ye shes sgyu ma'i sku gang las sgrub pa'i gzhi dang /
NK073(pu)005:741: ji ltar sgrub pa'i thabs shin tu gsal bar bshad pa rnams dang gcig go //
NK073(pu)005:742: de 'dra'i sku'i sgrub tshul rdzus skyes ltar bya pa
NK073(pu)005:743: 'di ni mgon po klu sgrub yab sras kyis bshad
NK073(pu)005:744: pa'i khungs dang bstun na rgya cher bshad du yod
NK073(pu)005:745: mod kyi re zhig mi 'chad la /
NK073(pu)005:746: don du de lta bu'i sku de skad cing dran
NK073(pu)005:747: rdzogs yin na gzhung 'diir gsungs pa 'di rnams de
NK073(pu)005:748: dang sbyar du mi rung ste /
NK073(pu)005:749: de la rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin yig 'bru las bskyed pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:750: sku de la lus dkyil 'god pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
NK073(pu)005:751: bden mdog kha ba 'dra shas che yang skyon med de /
NK073(pu)005:752: rnam mkhyen shing rtar snying ga'i rtsa 'khor gyi dbus
NK073(pu)005:753: su mi shigs pa'i thig le h+aum gi rnam par
NK073(pu)005:754: gsal ba dang / de nyid ye shes kyi sku'i sgrub tshul du gsungs pa bzhin /
NK073(pu)005:755: nges don gyi h+aum yig snying po ye shes chen
NK073(pu)005:756: po'i bzhon pa dang me rlung gi thig le de
NK073(pu)005:757: nyid las 'ja' lus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur ldang
NK073(pu)005:758: ba yin pas de rdzogs rim thun mong ma yin
NK073(pu)005:759: pa'i rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin du 'gro ba'i phyir dang
NK073(pu)005:760: / gnyug ma'i phung khams kyi rol rtsal du dag
NK073(pu)005:761: pa rab 'byams sgyu ma'i snang brnyan sangs rgyas kyi
NK073(pu)005:762: sprin phung cir yang 'char ba de lus dkyil gyi
NK073(pu)005:764: 'on kyang 'dir bstan rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul la
NK073(pu)005:765: lus dkyil 'khor sgom tshul kho nas khyab pa ni
NK073(pu)005:766: med de / dkyil 'khor pa'i lha gzhan gtso dang
NK073(pu)005:767: 'khor gyi rnam par rol pa ji snyed pa thams
NK073(pu)005:768: cad rang gi rtog tshogs ma lus pa yongs su
NK073(pu)005:769: dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du gsal la ma 'dres
NK073(pu)005:770: par sgom pa yang der 'gro ba'i phyir te /
NK073(pu)005:771: de lta min na gzhung 'di dag gis dkyil 'khor
NK073(pu)005:772: 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par ma bstan par
NK073(pu)005:774: de'i phyir 'od gsal rdzogs chen gyi rgyud sde'i ring
NK073(pu)005:775: lugs bla med rgyu gzhan dang mi 'dra ba'i lam
NK073(pu)005:776: gyi srol chen po zhig yod pa ni 'dir bstan
NK073(pu)005:777: gyi rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul dang cung zad mi
NK073(pu)005:778: 'dra ste / rgyud kyi rgyal po de'i lugs kyi
NK073(pu)005:779: chos gzugs kyi sku sgrub pa'i tshul rnams rgya cher
NK073(pu)005:781: de ltar tshul gsum gyi nang nas dang po ni /
NK073(pu)005:783: dngos rnams nyid ni dngos med par //
NK073(pu)005:784: rtogs pa'i dbang bsgyur ting 'dzin yin //
NK073(pu)005:786: snod bcud thams cad rang sems kyi ngo bo brjod
NK073(pu)005:787: du med pa'i gshis lhun mnyam yangs pa chen por
NK073(pu)005:788: rtsal gzhi la thim pa'i tshul gyis bsdus te /
NK073(pu)005:789: dmigs med kyi ting 'dzin nam mkha' ltar khyab cing
NK073(pu)005:790: gdal ba'i ngang la mnyam par 'jog pa de bzhin
NK073(pu)005:792: de ltar ma rtogs pa'i sems can rnams la sgyu
NK073(pu)005:793: ma lta bu'i snying rje phyogs lhung dang bral ba'i
NK073(pu)005:794: rnam ldan du shar ba kun snang gi ting nge
NK073(pu)005:795: 'dzin dang / de'i rkyen gyis chu dwangs pa las
NK073(pu)005:796: nya ldang ba'i tshul du rig pa ye shes kyi
NK073(pu)005:797: ngo bo h+aum yig la sogs pa'i yig 'brur sgom
NK073(pu)005:799: rgyu'i ting 'dzin dang de'i rgyud tshogs kun snang gi ting 'dzin gnyis bar srid sbyong byed dang /
NK073(pu)005:800: de'i snga la sogs kyi de ting 'chi sri sbyong byed dang /
NK073(pu)005:801: 'chad 'gyur gyi rdzogs pa'i tshul man chad skye ba
NK073(pu)005:802: sbyong byed du byas na slob dpon chen po 'jigs
NK073(pu)005:803: med 'byung gnas sogs chen po rnams kyi gzhung dang
NK073(pu)005:804: 'grigs so // de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzina rnam pa gsum rima gyis bskyed de /
NK073(pu)005:805: gsung yi ge sgyu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor dang //
NK073(pu)005:806: thugs phyag mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor rnams rim gyis gdan
NK073(pu)005:807: la bkoda cing bsgom pas bskyed pa'i tshul zhes bya
NK073(pu)005:808: ba de yongs su rdzogs par 'grub pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:811: rgyu rang gi skabs su bskyed pa'i sa bon la
NK073(pu)005:812: sogs pa yongs su gyur pa las dona dam par
NK073(pu)005:813: skye 'aggas meda pa'i lha dang lha mo ste rnam
NK073(pu)005:814: med stong pa nyid kyi lha'i phyag rgya rnam bcas
NK073(pu)005:815: chu nang gi zla ba lta bur lhar bzhengs pa
NK073(pu)005:817: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
NK073(pu)005:818: brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa bsgom //
NK073(pu)005:819: spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas //
NK073(pu)005:820: spros pa nyid kyis spros med bya //
NK073(pu)005:822: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis mi mthong
NK073(pu)005:823: ba'i tshul du blta bar bya ba'i don dbu ma
NK073(pu)005:824: rtag chad dang bra ba'i chos kyi dbyingsa rang bzhin
NK073(pu)005:825: rnam par dag pa'i klong lasa kyanga lta sgom gyi
NK073(pu)005:826: rtsi dang ma bra bas ma g.yo la /
NK073(pu)005:827: kun rdzob tu 'phagsa pa'i gzugsa kyi sku gtso dang
NK073(pu)005:828: 'khor gyi rnam rol du bstan pa thams cad kyanga
NK073(pu)005:829: mi 'gyur ba'i nga rgyal gyis brtan par gsal la
NK073(pu)005:830: / dwangs gasla rnyog pa dang bral bar bsgom zhing /
NK073(pu)005:831: brtan g.yo thams cad ye shes gcig gi rol mor
NK073(pu)005:832: mnyam la sku'i cha shas dang phyag zhabs kyi rnam
NK073(pu)005:833: 'gyur phra mo tshun chad ma 'dresa para bsgomsa pasa
NK073(pu)005:834: ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul de 'gruba bo //
NK073(pu)005:835: de'ang tha mal gyi zhen pa dag byed lha'i nga rgyal brtan pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:836: snang ba dag byed rnam pa gsal ba zhes gnyis su grags shing /
NK073(pu)005:837: snga ma la ma dag pa'i snang ba ma zhen pa tsam dang /
NK073(pu)005:838: de rang mtshan gyis grub par zhen pa gnyis kyi
NK073(pu)005:839: gnyen por nga rgyal brtan pa'i nang nas rang nyid
NK073(pu)005:840: lha de dang de'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /
NK073(pu)005:841: lha de bden med du lta ba'i nga rgyal gnyis
NK073(pu)005:842: 'jog par kun mkhyen rgyal ba yab sras kyi man
NK073(pu)005:844: gtsang ston 'grel par bskyed rdzogs kyi tshul 'di gnyis
NK073(pu)005:845: lta ba'i bskyed tshul yang mi 'dra bar byas shing
NK073(pu)005:846: / tshig gi go don la dpyad na de gnyis
NK073(pu)005:847: kyi snod rung du sgrub pa'i dbang yang mi 'dra
NK073(pu)005:848: pa sgyu 'phrul rtsa rgyud dang mdo tshogs chen 'dus
NK073(pu)005:849: pa lta bu la mdzad par snang yang sgyu 'phrul
NK073(pu)005:850: rtsa rgyud kyi le'u bcu gsum pa'i man ngag tu
NK073(pu)005:853: 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang //
NK073(pu)005:854: rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni //
NK073(pu)005:855: zhes rgyud sde bzhi'i dbye ba mdzad pa tsam las mi gsal zhing /
NK073(pu)005:856: 'chad 'gyur gyi rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul yang ma
NK073(pu)005:857: h+aa yo ga nas bshad pa dang thun mong du
NK073(pu)005:858: ma gyur pa'i bshad lugs gzhung na mi snang ba
NK073(pu)005:859: dang / de ltar mi snang bzhin du rtog bzo
NK073(pu)005:860: byas nas snon na thug pa med par 'gyur la
NK073(pu)005:861: dang / / spyir yang bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi
NK073(pu)005:862: dang ting 'dzin gsum dang yan lag drug dang rnal
NK073(pu)005:863: 'byor bzhi dang mngon byang lnga la sogs pa'i rim
NK073(pu)005:864: pa rnams dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor yongs rdzogs
NK073(pu)005:865: re'i nang du so so'i gzhung nas 'byung ba ltar
NK073(pu)005:866: sbyor rgyu yin pa 'phags yul gyi grub pa'i slob
NK073(pu)005:867: dpon rnams kyi lugs yongs su grags pa de bzhin
NK073(pu)005:868: du 'dir yang sbyar na gzhung gi sgras zin dang
NK073(pu)005:869: 'grigs par 'gyur ba'i phyir lam gyi 'gro lugs mi
NK073(pu)005:870: mthun pa gsum du mi bya zhes re zhig de
NK073(pu)005:871: dang / / ltar bya'o // gsum pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:872: rdzogsa pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i tshul ni /
NK073(pu)005:874: 'jiga rten las 'adsa pa'i zag med kyi chasa thamsa cada dbyer med par bsgom mo //
NK073(pu)005:875: de la 'jig rten ni rang gi phung po lnga'o //
NK073(pu)005:876: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
NK073(pu)005:877: rnams kyi rdo rje gsum po sku gsung thugsa mi
NK073(pu)005:878: zad pa ste / de gnyis dbyer med pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:881: bde ba'i thabs kyi sdom pa ste //
NK073(pu)005:882: sangs rgyas nga rgyal rnal 'byor gyis //
NK073(pu)005:883: sangs rgyas nyid yun ring mi 'gyur //
NK073(pu)005:884: zhes gsungs pa ltar dag pa rab 'byams ye shes
NK073(pu)005:885: kyi rol mo gcig tu khams gsum ma lus pa
NK073(pu)005:886: yongs su sad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi de kho na
NK073(pu)005:888: tha mal gyi snang ba'i steng du dag pa'i lha
NK073(pu)005:889: snang lhan pa btab pa lta bu'i tshul ma yin
NK073(pu)005:890: par / snang grags rig gsum rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du dngos su 'phos pa'i nga rgyal bya ba'o //
NK073(pu)005:891: de'ang rdo rje'i sngags rgyud du ma zhig tu nges
NK073(pu)005:892: don yi dkyil 'khor sdud rim rgyas par gsungs pa
NK073(pu)005:893: dang / gzhan yang grub pa'i slob dpon rnams kyi
NK073(pu)005:894: gzhung na sbyang gzhi'i ming sbyong byed la btags pa
NK073(pu)005:895: dang sbyong byed kyi ming sbyang gzhi la btags pa
NK073(pu)005:896: mang du snang ba ni skye 'chi bar do gsum
NK073(pu)005:897: rnams dri ma rnams de dang rnam pa mthun pa'i
NK073(pu)005:899: gzhi dus kyi skye 'chi bar do gsum ji 'dra
NK073(pu)005:900: ba'i 'bras bu yongs su dag pa'i sku gsum bsgrub
NK073(pu)005:902: gzhi 'bras gnyis dang rjes mthun gyi bskyed pa dang
NK073(pu)005:903: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom dgos par go ba'i slad
NK073(pu)005:904: du gsung ba'o // de'i phyir rang gi sgo gsum
NK073(pu)005:905: dkyil 'khora gsum gyi bsgrub gzhi'i rang bzhin ye nas
NK073(pu)005:906: yin par rtogsa nas sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i 'khor lor
NK073(pu)005:907: du gsung ba'o // sgoma pa ste / de'i tshul la /
NK073(pu)005:908: rdo rje lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pas ni rtsa
NK073(pu)005:909: rlung thig le byin gyis rlob pa'i khyad par gyis
NK073(pu)005:910: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin myur du 'grub
NK073(pu)005:912: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog gi ting 'dzin gtso
NK073(pu)005:913: bo dang 'khor gyi rnam pa mang por spro bas
NK073(pu)005:914: ni / sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'khor nges pa phun sum tshogs pa lam du byed cing /
NK073(pu)005:915: kha cig der ma zad srid pa'i gnas kyi sde
NK073(pu)005:916: ris dang bran g.yog rgyas pa sogs 'dod yon la
NK073(pu)005:917: zhen pa'i bag chags kyang sbyong bar 'chad do //
NK073(pu)005:918: 'on kyang 'di'i bka' srol du rgyal mchog gsum gyi tha snyad mi 'byung ngo //
NK073(pu)005:919: spyir rnam byang phyogs kyi mthar thug mi slob pa'i
NK073(pu)005:920: sas bsdus kyi ston pa dang 'khor gyi rnam pa
NK073(pu)005:921: lam du byed pa ni sngags spyi'i 'gro lugs su
NK073(pu)005:922: bdag nyid chen po gter chen pradz+ny+aa'i zhabs kyis /
NK073(pu)005:923: sku dang zhing khams 'khor dang mdzad pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:924: yongs su dag pa'i ye shes lam nyid du //
NK073(pu)005:925: byed dang mi byed sngags dang pha rol phyin //
NK073(pu)005:926: zhes gsungs shing sngar bshad pas kyang rtogs par nus so //
NK073(pu)005:927: sngags bla med kyi khyad chos gzhi'i srid pa skye
NK073(pu)005:928: 'chi bar do gsum dang rnam mthun du sgom pa
NK073(pu)005:929: yang rnal 'byor de dang de'i khog rags pa zhig
NK073(pu)005:931: dmigs pa'i phra zhib re re nas bstun pa mi dgos te /
NK073(pu)005:932: de dgos na thug pa med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:933: zhes smra ba rgya gar grub chen gyi lugs su ma zad /
NK073(pu)005:934: sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i zab gter gyi bdag po chen
NK073(pu)005:935: po rnams kyi bka' srol rma med pa'ang yin te
NK073(pu)005:936: kho bo'i mgrin pa gzengs mthon por bstod de bshad
NK073(pu)005:937: kyang mi nus pa min no //
NK073(pu)005:938: mdor na de'i phyir dkyil 'khor spro ba de 'khor
NK073(pu)005:939: ba'i gnas skabs na bu dang bu mo mang du
NK073(pu)005:940: 'phel ba dang sde ris kyi rnam grangs mang ba
NK073(pu)005:941: lta bu'i chos mthun pa'i yul zhig dang ma sbyar
NK073(pu)005:943: de ltar zhar la 'ong ba nyung ngu zhig brjod nas dkyus don ni /
NK073(pu)005:944: sgyu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor de 'ang dag pa sbyor
NK073(pu)005:945: tshul gyi sgo nas bshad na rtsa rgyud gsang snying
NK073(pu)005:946: las / rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni //
NK073(pu)005:947: rdzogsa pa'i sangas rgyas lnga ru gragsa //
NK073(pu)005:948: skye mched khamsa rnams mang po kun //
NK073(pu)005:949: byang chub semsa dpa'i dkyil 'khora nyid //
NK073(pu)005:950: sa chu spyan dang m+aa ma k+ai //
NK073(pu)005:951: me rlung gosa dkar sgrol ma ste //
NK073(pu)005:952: nama mkha'a dbyingsa kyi dbang phyug ma //
NK073(pu)005:953: srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag /
NK073(pu)005:954: ces 'byung ba ltar shes par bya ste /
NK073(pu)005:955: don dam par 'khora ba dang mya ngan las 'adsa
NK073(pu)005:956: pa'i chos thamsa cada ye nas ma skyes ma byung
NK073(pu)005:957: bar gsungs te / rigs pa drug cu par /
NK073(pu)005:959: de gnyis yod pa ma yin no //
NK073(pu)005:961: tha snyad du ni dkon mchog brtsegs pa las /
NK073(pu)005:962: rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten rnam btags te //
NK073(pu)005:963: 'du shes 'dzin pas byis pa rnam par phye //
NK073(pu)005:964: zhes rtog pa'i rang rtsal 'ba' zhig tu dngos po rnams bsnyon med du yod par gsungs shing /
NK073(pu)005:966: rang rang gi bya ba bslu med byed nus pa'i
NK073(pu)005:967: sgo nas sgyu ma bzhin du snang ba sus kyang
NK073(pu)005:969: theg pa 'dir don dam par rang bzhin med pa'i lta ba tsam du ma zad /
NK073(pu)005:970: kun rdzob pa'i chos phung po lnga'am lhar lta bar byed de /
NK073(pu)005:972: bde bar gshegas pa'i mtshan can yaba yum bcu la
NK073(pu)005:973: sogas pa'i bsgrubs gzhi'i ranga bzhina me'i bsgrub gzhir gtsub
NK073(pu)005:974: shing 'gro ba bzhin du ye nasa yin pa'i tshul
NK073(pu)005:975: du lta'o // 'di 'dra zhig sngon du'ang smos ma thag pa yin mod kyi /
NK073(pu)005:976: skabs 'dir gsungs pa ni tshig snga ma de'i gsal byed yin pas zlos skyon med do //
NK073(pu)005:977: 'di dag gi skabs su kho bo cag gi bla
NK073(pu)005:978: ma rnams chos thams cad ye shes rang snang du
NK073(pu)005:979: sgo du ma nas sgrub par mdzad de /
NK073(pu)005:980: de'i tshul gtan tshigs kyi sgo nas spros na mtha'
NK073(pu)005:981: med kyang bsgrub bya'i snying po tshig gcig la dril
NK073(pu)005:982: na / ye shes zhes pa ye shes gang rung rung la mi bya'i gnyug ma'i sems la bya'o //
NK073(pu)005:983: rang snang zhes pa rang la snang lugs gang byung
NK073(pu)005:984: byung la mi bya'i gnyug sems ka nas dag pa'i
NK073(pu)005:985: rang rig nang gsal shin tu phra ba'i ye shes
NK073(pu)005:987: de'i phyir ka ba dang bu ma pa la sogs
NK073(pu)005:988: pa'i dngos po rnams dkar ser dmar ljang gi lha
NK073(pu)005:989: dang lha mo bzhin lag can sha stag par sgrub
NK073(pu)005:990: mi dgos kyi / 'od gsal gyi sems 'ba' zhig
NK073(pu)005:991: med na 'khor 'das thams cad snod du mi rung
NK073(pu)005:992: mi dgos kyi / ba dang / de yod pas
NK073(pu)005:993: chos thams cad de'i rol rtsal du shar bar grub
NK073(pu)005:994: na de tsam zhig gis ye shes rang snang gi
NK073(pu)005:995: gnad dpyis phyin par zin pa yin te /
NK073(pu)005:997: sems nyid gcig pu kun gyi sa bon te //
NK073(pu)005:998: gang la srid dang mya ngan 'das 'phro ba //
NK073(pu)005:999: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa yi //
NK073(pu)005:1000: yid bzhin nor 'dra'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK073(pu)005:1001: zhes gsungs pa 'di khungs su drangs te chos dbyings
NK073(pu)005:1002: mdzod kyi 'grel par thams cad mkhyen pa dri med
NK073(pu)005:1003: 'od zer gyis rgya cher ji skad gsungs pa bzhin
NK073(pu)005:1004: no // de ltar 'chad pa de skabs 'dir 'brel ba sgrub tshul sogs mang bas ma bkod do //
NK073(pu)005:1005: de ltar chosa thamsa cad ranga bzhina gyis mya ngan lasa 'adsa pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:1006: chena po lnga ni yuma lnga'i rang bzhina snang ba'i dbyings dang /
NK073(pu)005:1007: sra ba'i gnyen pa'i dro ba'i bskyod pa'i dbyings zhes rtsa rgyud le'u dang por gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK073(pu)005:1008: de bzhin du phung po lnga ni rigas lnga'i sangas rgyas te /
NK073(pu)005:1009: rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1010: mthong ba dang thos pa sogs rnam para shesa pa
NK073(pu)005:1011: bzhi ni sa snying la sogs pa byang chub semas
NK073(pu)005:1013: gzugs kyi skye mched nas ro'i khams kyi bar yul
NK073(pu)005:1014: bzhi ni sgeg mo la sogs pa mdzes pa'i lha
NK073(pu)005:1016: mig shes sogs kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i bdag
NK073(pu)005:1017: rkyen dbang po gzugs can pa bzhi ni byams pa
NK073(pu)005:1018: la sogs pa sku'i byang chub semas dapa'a bzhi'i rang
NK073(pu)005:1019: bzhina / 'das pa nas ma nges pa'i bar gyi
NK073(pu)005:1020: dus bzhi ni spos ma la sogs pa mchoda pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1022: lusa kyi dabnga po dang lus kyi rnam para shes
NK073(pu)005:1023: pa dang yul reg bya'i skye mched dang de lasa
NK073(pu)005:1024: byung ba'i byang chub kyi semsa sam de ma thag
NK073(pu)005:1025: rkyen yid shes rnams ni rnam rgyal sogs khro bo
NK073(pu)005:1026: bzhi'i ranga bzhina / rtag chad bdag mtshan gyi mu'am
NK073(pu)005:1027: mtha' bzhi ni lcags kyu ma la sogs pa khro
NK073(pu)005:1028: mo bzhi'i rang bzhina du gsungs so //
NK073(pu)005:1029: yida kyi rnam para shesa pa ni byang chub kyi
NK073(pu)005:1030: semas rdo rje ste rigs drug pa kuna tu bzang
NK073(pu)005:1031: po'i rang bzhin zhes gsungs pa'i skabs 'di'i yid kyi
NK073(pu)005:1032: rnam shes dang smos ma thag pa'i yid shes gnyis
NK073(pu)005:1034: rnam par shes pa'i khams drug pa ni 'dir gsungs pa yin zhing /
NK073(pu)005:1035: dbang po'i khams drug pa ni smos ma thag pa yin te /
NK073(pu)005:1036: 'on kyang lha dang dag sbyor gyi tshe sbyang gzhi
NK073(pu)005:1037: rnams re re nas sne mo ba bsko ba ltar
NK073(pu)005:1038: mi 'dra ba sha stag mi dgos te /
NK073(pu)005:1040: de'i ya gyal 'byung bzhi yum bzhir gsungs pa'i gsar rnying gi rgyud sde ches mang ba bzhin no //
NK073(pu)005:1041: yid kyi rnam shes de'i yul chosa khams 'dusa byasa
NK073(pu)005:1042: pa tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed rnam rig min
NK073(pu)005:1043: gzugs bzhi dang / 'dus ma byas 'gog pa gnyis dang /
NK073(pu)005:1044: nam mkha' ste bdun ni chos bya ba mo kun tu bazanga mo'i ranga bzhina te /
NK073(pu)005:1045: bka' srol du'ang 'di skor la dpyad pa mdzad pa cher mi snang ngo //
NK073(pu)005:1046: de lta bu'i phung khams skye mched de daga kyang
NK073(pu)005:1047: ye nasa mngona para rdzogas para sangas rgyasa pa'i ranga
NK073(pu)005:1048: bzhina yina gyi / de lam gyisa gsar du bsgrub pa la ltos pa ma yin no //
NK073(pu)005:1049: rdzogs pa chen po 'dus ma byas su gsungs pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1050: don yang gnyug mar gnas shing 'chi 'pho dang bral
NK073(pu)005:1052: nam mkha' lta bu'i med dgag cig la mi bya zhes smra'o //
NK073(pu)005:1055: mkhas pa dag ni bstan bcos 'chad pa na //
NK073(pu)005:1056: lus la ye shes yod pa ma rtogs so //
NK073(pu)005:1057: zhes shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i 'od gsal gyi
NK073(pu)005:1058: sems ngo bo dri ma'i rnam ldan du skye ma
NK073(pu)005:1059: myong ba'i ngang tshul can de sems can thams cad
NK073(pu)005:1060: kyi rgyud la til 'bru snum gyis khyab pa bzhin
NK073(pu)005:1061: 'du 'bral skad cig kyang yod mi srid de /
NK073(pu)005:1063: tsit+ta rin chen gzhal yas na //
NK073(pu)005:1064: stong gsal 'dus pa sku yi gdangs //
NK073(pu)005:1067: der gsal mi shigs thig le'i gzugs //
NK073(pu)005:1068: yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam //
NK073(pu)005:1070: tshul can snying dbus rtag tu gnas //
NK073(pu)005:1072: de 'dra'i sems kyi gtugs sa mthar thug de'i cho
NK073(pu)005:1073: 'phrul 'ba' zhig tu sems can rnams kyi nang gi
NK073(pu)005:1074: khams drug dang / phyi rol gyi gnas ris dang
NK073(pu)005:1075: longs spyod la sogs pa thams cad yongs su bkod
NK073(pu)005:1076: cing tshe rabs snga ma'i phung po rnams 'od gsal
NK073(pu)005:1077: du thim nas slar yang las kyi dbang gis 'jig
NK073(pu)005:1078: rten phyi ma'i bar srid kyi phung po rnams sems
NK073(pu)005:1079: de'i rang gdangs su shar ba'i tshul gyis /
NK073(pu)005:1080: thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnams su
NK073(pu)005:1081: skye 'chi 'gal me'i rtsed mo ltar snang bar zad
NK073(pu)005:1082: pas / snang gzhi'i sems mthar thug gi ngos na gos pa rdul cha tsam yang med la /
NK073(pu)005:1083: nam zhig las rlung gi g.yo ba bag chags dang
NK073(pu)005:1084: bcas pa thams cad slar mi ldang ba'i tshul du
NK073(pu)005:1085: nye bar zhi ba de'i tshe /
NK073(pu)005:1086: sems gnyug ma mi shigs pa'i ngo bo nyid de
NK073(pu)005:1087: ka rang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
NK073(pu)005:1088: su 'gro ba ma gtogs thob bya'i yon tan gzhan
NK073(pu)005:1089: tshol la rag mi las pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis gzhi'i
NK073(pu)005:1090: chos sku dang / gzhi'i sangs rgyas la sogs par mi btags pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:1091: mtha' chod par na sems de'i rtsal las snang ba rnam pa gsum skye tshul dang /
NK073(pu)005:1092: de las kun rtog gi rgyu ba 'phel tshul dang /
NK073(pu)005:1093: de las kyang sgo lnga'i shes pa rim gyis rgyas tshul dang /
NK073(pu)005:1094: kun rtog nyon mongs pa rnams la brten nas las gsog tshul dang /
NK073(pu)005:1095: las de'i dbang gis 'gro ba so so'i skye gnas
NK073(pu)005:1096: thams cad dang gnas mtho dman thams cad yongs su
NK073(pu)005:1098: de dag gi gnas skabs thams cad du gnyug ma'i
NK073(pu)005:1099: sems 'pho 'gyur med cing rmi lam gnyid kyi cho
NK073(pu)005:1100: 'phrul du shar ba ltar snod bcud de'i sgyu 'phrul
NK073(pu)005:1102: de nyid kyi rgyu mtshan las sgyu ma lta bu'i
NK073(pu)005:1103: ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sbyangs pa na snod
NK073(pu)005:1104: bcud gang na'ang ma dag pa gshis la zhugs pa
NK073(pu)005:1105: zhig med tshul sogs rgyud 'grel chen mo rnams su
NK073(pu)005:1107: gsang bdag zhal lung dang rong zom zhabs kyi snang
NK073(pu)005:1108: ba lhar sgrub na mthun snang gi blta bya la
NK073(pu)005:1109: sbyar ba'i rigs pa gzhan yang gsungs mod kyi /
NK073(pu)005:1110: rdo rje'i lam la nges pa ster ba la 'di rang 'gags che bar go'o //
NK073(pu)005:1111: de ltar phyogsa bcu dus gsum dang khamsa gsum la
NK073(pu)005:1112: sogsa pa 'dus byas dang 'adus ma byas pa'i chosa
NK073(pu)005:1113: thamsa cada rang gi semas 'od gsal ba'i ye shes
NK073(pu)005:1114: kyi rnam rol lasa gud na med de zhes ma
NK073(pu)005:1115: bshad na / kha cig 'di la brten nas tshig
NK073(pu)005:1116: 'di'i bstan don snang ba sems su ngo sprad pa
NK073(pu)005:1117: 'dra ba gcig la 'khrul pa'i dogs pa yang 'byung
NK073(pu)005:1118: chog pa'i tshod du snang mod /
NK073(pu)005:1119: 'on kyang 'jig rten na lha sbyin gyi bum pa tsertasa brkus na /
NK073(pu)005:1120: lha sbyin gyis de la 'di skad du /
NK073(pu)005:1121: nga'i bum pa de ni khyod las gzhan na med do zhes zer mod kyi /
NK073(pu)005:1122: khyod lto ldir yin zer ba min par /
NK073(pu)005:1123: bum pa rku mkhan de khyod yin zhes bsam nas yin cing /
NK073(pu)005:1124: tshig de skyon can yang yin mi dgos te /
NK073(pu)005:1125: brda'i tha snyad de tsam gyis pha rol po la don de ston nus pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:1126: gzhan du na mgon po klus /
NK073(pu)005:1127: gzugs kyi dngos po ming tsam phyir //
NK073(pu)005:1128: zhes gsungs pa'ang mi rigs par thal bar 'gyur te /
NK073(pu)005:1129: gzugs ming gis bzhag pa tsam la dgongs pa min na gzugs ming yin tshul med pa'i phyir te /
NK073(pu)005:1130: ming ldan min 'du byed yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:1131: chos thams cad sems nyid kyi rol par shar ba'i khungs su /
NK073(pu)005:1132: ji skad du zhes 'jig rten gsum rgyal las /
NK073(pu)005:1133: ranga semsa so sor rtog pa ni //
NK073(pu)005:1134: sangsa rgyas byang chub de nyid do //
NK073(pu)005:1135: 'jiga rten gsum po de nyid do //
NK073(pu)005:1136: 'byung ba che rnams de nyid do //
NK073(pu)005:1139: chos rnams thamsa cad ni semsa la gnas so //
NK073(pu)005:1140: semsa ni nam mkha'a lta bu'i stong nyid kyi gzhi la gansa so //
NK073(pu)005:1141: nam mkha' lta bu'i gnas lugs de ni mtshan ma ci la'ang mi gansa so //
NK073(pu)005:1143: chosa thamsa cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1144: chosa thamsa cad ni gdona ma nas rang bzhina rnam para dam pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1145: chosa thamsa cad ni yongas kyis 'od gasla ba'o //
NK073(pu)005:1146: chosa thamsa cad ni rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1147: chos thamsa cad ni mngona par rdzogsa par sangs rgyas pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1149: 'dir lung gi drang mtshams la bshad dgos pa mang
NK073(pu)005:1150: yang phal cher spyod bsdus sgron me'i rigs pa zhig
NK073(pu)005:1151: dang sbyar na 'chad thub par snang ste spros pa
NK073(pu)005:1152: bskyungs so // 'di ni rdzogsa pa chen po'o //
NK073(pu)005:1153: zhes pa la bcu bdun rgyud sogs nas yongs su
NK073(pu)005:1154: grags pa'i rdzogs pa chen po'i sgra bshad ni re
NK073(pu)005:1156: 'dir bstan gyi rdzogas pa chen po'i don ni ting
NK073(pu)005:1157: nge 'dzin gyi thos pa che zhing rgyas pa'i don
NK073(pu)005:1158: no zhes bshad zin mod de /
NK073(pu)005:1159: 'di thad kyi mchan dkyus shor zhig na bsod nams
NK073(pu)005:1160: dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa 'bras bu'i chos
NK073(pu)005:1161: lhun gyis grub pa'i don to zhes bshad pa yang
NK073(pu)005:1162: yid ngor mi 'grigs pa min no //
NK073(pu)005:1167: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i rim pa ste tshul bzhis bshad pa las /
NK073(pu)005:1169: rtogsa pa rnam pa bzhi ni /
NK073(pu)005:1170: rtsa rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa las /
NK073(pu)005:1171: rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul //
NK073(pu)005:1172: byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa //
NK073(pu)005:1173: rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis //
NK073(pu)005:1174: thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che //
NK073(pu)005:1175: zhes pa ltar rgyu gcig par rtogsa pa dang //
NK073(pu)005:1176: yig 'bru'i tshul gyis rtogs pa dang //
NK073(pu)005:1177: byin gyis brlabs kyis rtogsa pa dang //
NK073(pu)005:1179: 'di rnams sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyal po bsgyur ba'i
NK073(pu)005:1180: ting nge 'dzin gyi skabs dang sbrel te gsungs shing
NK073(pu)005:1181: / de'i nang nas kyang le'u de'i bstan don tshogs
NK073(pu)005:1182: kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas gang zhig bsgrub bya'i
NK073(pu)005:1183: gtso bo bstan par snang zhing /
NK073(pu)005:1184: mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i don yang zung 'jug sgyu 'phrul
NK073(pu)005:1185: d+r+wa ba'i go 'phang la byed dgos par mngon te
NK073(pu)005:1186: / spyir sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i don ni /
NK073(pu)005:1188: de bzhin thams cad stong gsal las //
NK073(pu)005:1190: ces rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyi sku la gsungs so //
NK073(pu)005:1191: bla ma snga ma rnams 'di bzhi la gtan tshigs bzhir mdzad mod /
NK073(pu)005:1192: shes par 'dod na gzhan du blta'o //
NK073(pu)005:1193: de la rgyu gacig par rtogsa pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:1194: chos thamsa cad don dam par ma skyes zhes pa
NK073(pu)005:1195: 'di la rgyal dbang dri med 'od zer dang rdo
NK073(pu)005:1196: rje sems dpa' 'od gsal sna tshogs rang grol gyi
NK073(pu)005:1197: gzhung na don dam bden pa'i 'jog tshul thun mong
NK073(pu)005:1198: ma yin pa 'od gsal gyi sems de kho na
NK073(pu)005:1199: nyid du zhugs pa la gsal bar bshad pasa 'di
NK073(pu)005:1200: yang de'i ngor shes bya gang yang mi rnyed pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1201: don no // de'i phyir rig pa'i ye shes chos
NK073(pu)005:1202: thams cad dang so so ma yin pa zhes gsungs
NK073(pu)005:1203: don no // so // 'jigs med 'byung gnas zhabs
NK073(pu)005:1204: kyis kyang lhan skyes kyi bde chen shes bya'i de
NK073(pu)005:1205: nyid dang ro gcig tu zhugs pa'i sgo nas shes
NK073(pu)005:1206: bya thams cad ye shes kyis khyab pa'i tshig bstan
NK073(pu)005:1208: kun rdzogs la'ang gang gi zlas 'dren pa'i don dam
NK073(pu)005:1209: 'jog tshul gyi dbye bas mi mtshungs pa 'ga' zhig
NK073(pu)005:1210: yod pa las / 'dir ni 'od gsal ba'i ye
NK073(pu)005:1211: shes la don dam gyi sgras bsnyad pa de'i zlas
NK073(pu)005:1213: ye shes de'i snang cha'am de'i rang mdangs sam de'i
NK073(pu)005:1214: snying po mi shigs pa'i rlung phra ba las byung
NK073(pu)005:1215: ba'i sku'i mthar thug cig la bya ste /
NK073(pu)005:1216: de 'dra'i kun rdzob tu ni rig pa'i snang brnyan
NK073(pu)005:1217: chu zla dang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid btags pa tsam
NK073(pu)005:1218: dang brten nas 'byung ba tsam ste snang la rang
NK073(pu)005:1219: bzhin med pa'i ngang tshul can du grub pa dang
NK073(pu)005:1220: / shes bya thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar
NK073(pu)005:1221: sems kyi gdangs phyir gsal thugs rje'i snang char shar
NK073(pu)005:1222: ba tsam gyis chos su zad pas na tshul gcig
NK073(pu)005:1223: pa'i sgo nas so so ma yin pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:1225: 'di la chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i rten
NK073(pu)005:1226: 'brel tsam du 'dra ba las lhag pa'i sngags bla
NK073(pu)005:1227: med kyi lugs thun mong ma yin pas /
NK073(pu)005:1229: sgyu ma rlung gis khams gsum pa //
NK073(pu)005:1230: rmi lam rmi ba bzhin du mthong //
NK073(pu)005:1231: zhes pa lta bu'i go lugs khyad par can zhig yod pa de shes dgos so //
NK073(pu)005:1232: de ltar 'od gsal ba'i rig pa shes bya'i yin
NK073(pu)005:1233: lugs dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i zung 'jug cig dang
NK073(pu)005:1234: / de'i rang gdangs ni 'od gsal lhun grub kyi
NK073(pu)005:1235: dkyil 'khor thams cad shes bya mtha' dag dang tshul
NK073(pu)005:1236: gcig tu gyur pa'i ro gcig gnyis bstan nas /
NK073(pu)005:1237: da ni thun mong ma yin pa'i zung 'jug dpyis phyin pa /
NK073(pu)005:1239: snang ba dang ni stong pa dag /
NK073(pu)005:1240: so so'i char ni shes gyur nas //
NK073(pu)005:1241: gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa //
NK073(pu)005:1242: zung du 'jug pa de bshad do //
NK073(pu)005:1244: gter chen pradz+ny+aa'i zhal nas kyang /
NK073(pu)005:1245: rim pa bzhi pa'i don gyi 'od gsal dang //
NK073(pu)005:1246: dbyer med lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i dngos //
NK073(pu)005:1247: bden gnyis zung du 'jug pa'i he ru ka /
NK073(pu)005:1248: zhes ji skad du gsungs pa bzhin gyi tshul de bstan par bzhed nas /
NK073(pu)005:1249: chos thams cad dang ro gcig pa'i gcig gi sgyu ma lta bu'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK073(pu)005:1250: ma skyes pa'i yul can 'od gsal de gnyis zung 'jug mnyam pa nyid du gyur tshul ni /
NK073(pu)005:1251: bde ba chen po'i ye shes gcig nyid dag pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1252: brtan g.yo sna tshogs pa'i gar gyis chu zla ltar
NK073(pu)005:1253: rol pa la sgyu ma sna tshogsa su snang zhing
NK073(pu)005:1254: zhes gsungs so // de ltar snang ba de'ang /
NK073(pu)005:1256: bya byed nus pa'i gzi byin gyis //
NK073(pu)005:1257: sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog /
NK073(pu)005:1258: ces pa ltar don gnyis sgrub pa'i bya ba rlabs po che byed nus pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:1259: snang dus nyid nas sgyu ma lta bu'i snang ba
NK073(pu)005:1260: de nyid la rnam smin gyi phung po'i rdul dang
NK073(pu)005:1261: gzhan yang rung ste mdor na rdul phra rab kyi
NK073(pu)005:1262: ngo bo nyid dam ye shes las ngo bo gzhan
NK073(pu)005:1263: du gyur pa'i rang bzhin ni ci yang med de
NK073(pu)005:1264: don gzhan du ma skyes pas kun rdzob pa'i sku
NK073(pu)005:1265: dang don dam pa'i bde ba tha dad med par
NK073(pu)005:1266: gnas pa'am dbyer meda pas na /
NK073(pu)005:1267: de 'dra'i bde gnyis zung 'jug thob pa na rgyu gacig par rtogsa pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1268: spyir chos de rtogs na chos de thob mi dgos pa yod mod kyang /
NK073(pu)005:1269: 'di ni bshad ma thag par mngon no //
NK073(pu)005:1271: chos thamsa cad ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin dang gnyis
NK073(pu)005:1272: su med par zhugs pa'i bde chen ni nges don
NK073(pu)005:1273: gyi a ste gsung gi ranga bzhin /
NK073(pu)005:1274: ma skyes pa nyid dam ye shes rnam par mi
NK073(pu)005:1275: rtog pa yul ming yul can la btags pa de
NK073(pu)005:1276: nyid kun rdzob phyag rgya sgyu mar snang zhing bya
NK073(pu)005:1277: ba byed nus pa ni o ste sku'i rang bzhina
NK073(pu)005:1278: / de ltar rtog pa'i rig pa lhan skyes bde
NK073(pu)005:1279: mchog sgyu ma'i ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa
NK073(pu)005:1280: zhes lus lta bu'i sems dang /
NK073(pu)005:1281: sems lta bu'i lus kyi rnam bzhag dpal ldan zla
NK073(pu)005:1282: ba grags pas bkral nas gsungs pa lta bu ni
NK073(pu)005:1283: gyi don te thugs kyi rang bzhin du rtogsa pa'o
NK073(pu)005:1284: // de'ang ye shes la gsung dang /
NK073(pu)005:1285: gnyug ma'i lus la sku dang /
NK073(pu)005:1286: de gnyis dbyer med la thugs su gsungs pa ni
NK073(pu)005:1287: sems dpa' sum brtsegs kyi go ba'i steng nas shes
NK073(pu)005:1288: par bya ba kho bo'i zhe 'dod yin te /
NK073(pu)005:1289: 'di ltar 'od gsal nam mkha'i gzugs can gyi sems
NK073(pu)005:1290: chen po de'i bzhon pa gzhom du med pa'i na
NK073(pu)005:1291: d+aa ni rtogs pa gsum pa'i skabs su 'chad 'gyur
NK073(pu)005:1292: ltar ye shes sems dpa' longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
NK073(pu)005:1293: mtshan dpe 'bar ba'i rnam par bzhengs pa yin la
NK073(pu)005:1294: / de dang ngo bo dbyer mi phyed pa'i bde
NK073(pu)005:1295: ba chen po gnyug ma'i yid ni ting nge 'dzin
NK073(pu)005:1296: sems dpa' nges pa don gyi yi ge yin te
NK073(pu)005:1298: mi shigs thig le wam dbyibs can //
NK073(pu)005:1299: rang la bde ba gsal byed dag /
NK073(pu)005:1301: de gnyis ka'ang dam tshig sems dpa'i thugs kyi gsang
NK073(pu)005:1302: bar nges par na thugs su'ang gsungs pa sku thugs
NK073(pu)005:1303: du ma ro gcig la go ba skyed pa'i ched
NK073(pu)005:1305: rtogs tshul 'dis kyang rgyu gcig pa'i skabs kyi brjod
NK073(pu)005:1306: bya de slar yang dpes bstan pa tsam zhig mdzad
NK073(pu)005:1307: pa'o // byin gyis brlabs kyis rtogsa pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:1308: dper na rasa dkar po la dmar por byin gyis rlob pa'i mathu btsod la yod pa bzhina du /
NK073(pu)005:1309: gnyug ma'i khams dang skye mched kyi chos thamsa cad
NK073(pu)005:1310: gdod nas rang bzhin dag pa'i sangsa rgyas yin pa
NK073(pu)005:1311: la rnal 'byor pas thabs khyad par can gyis dag
NK073(pu)005:1312: pa mthar phyin pa'i sangs rgyas gsang chen rigs gcig
NK073(pu)005:1313: tu nges par byin gyis rlob pa'i mthu yang bde
NK073(pu)005:1314: ba chen po'i rdzogs rim la yod de /
NK073(pu)005:1315: yod tshul ni rgyu gciga pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul
NK073(pu)005:1316: gyis sngar bstan pa bzhin rig pa byang chub kyi
NK073(pu)005:1317: sems nyid kyis rang gi snang cha shin tu phra
NK073(pu)005:1318: ba'i rlung de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs skur
NK073(pu)005:1319: sbyong zhing byin gyis rlobs pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:1320: zab pa'i bde chen ma rtogs pa de srid du rgya che ba'i sku de'ang rtogs mi srid la /
NK073(pu)005:1321: zab pa'i ye shes la nus pa ci tsam thob
NK073(pu)005:1322: pa de tsam du zab gsal gnyis med kyi sku'i
NK073(pu)005:1323: khyad par yang gong nas gong du 'jug pa'i gnad
NK073(pu)005:1324: mtha' chod pa zhig gi steng nas yun ring por
NK073(pu)005:1326: de ni byin gyis brlabs kyis rtogsa pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1327: mngona sum para rtogsa pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:1328: chos thamsa cad ye nas sangsa rgyas par gnas pa de'ang /
NK073(pu)005:1329: gsang sngags bla med kyi rgyud sde'i lung dang mi 'gal zhing /
NK073(pu)005:1330: bla ma rtsa bshad kyi rgyud don rnyed pa'i mana ngag dang 'agla ba'ang ma yin la /
NK073(pu)005:1331: thos bsam gyis sgo nas lung dang man ngag gi tshig la thos rgya mang ba dang /
NK073(pu)005:1332: don la dpyad stobs rdzogs pa tsam zhig la gdeng 'cha' zhing brtena bcas pa yang ma yin par /
NK073(pu)005:1333: bsgom byung gi rtsal yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgo nas
NK073(pu)005:1334: rang gi rig pa'i blos gting du yid ches shing
NK073(pu)005:1335: brtan pa thob pas sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes
NK073(pu)005:1336: kyi sku dwangs pa'i mkha' la 'ja' tshon ltar shar
NK073(pu)005:1337: ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du rtogsa pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1338: mngon sum du rtogs tshul 'di la ni don gyi 'od gsal mthar gcig tu mi dgos so //
NK073(pu)005:1339: de ltar na rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul gnyis kyis zung 'jug gi go 'phang dngos bstan /
NK073(pu)005:1341: mngon sum pa'i tshul gnyis kyis go 'phang de 'grub tshul bstan pa yin pas /
NK073(pu)005:1342: 'od gsal rdzogs pa chen po'i lugs la ri stong
NK073(pu)005:1343: gzhon nu bum sku'i go 'phang sgrub tshul snang ba
NK073(pu)005:1344: rnam pa bzhi'i lam nas bstan pa'i shing rta'i srol
NK073(pu)005:1345: chen po de ma gtogs pa /
NK073(pu)005:1346: he ru ka galpo la sogs pa'i pha rgyud dang
NK073(pu)005:1347: ma rgyud kyi lam mtha' dag gis chings yang rdzogs
NK073(pu)005:1348: rim pa'i zung 'jug gi go ba 'dis byed pas
NK073(pu)005:1349: lam dum bu ba zhig tu gzung bar byas na
NK073(pu)005:1350: mi rigs pa shin tu chen po ste /
NK073(pu)005:1351: gtan la phab ste spros na mtha' yas so //
NK073(pu)005:1352: tshul 'di lta yang dag pa'i lam gyis yid ches
NK073(pu)005:1353: pa ni sngags bla med spyi'i lam la yid ches
NK073(pu)005:1354: pa yin te / rtogsa pa rnam pa bzhi'i don rdo rje sku'i rnal 'byor dang /
NK073(pu)005:1355: bde chen zab mo'i rnal 'byor gnyis ji lta ba
NK073(pu)005:1356: bzhin du rig pa nyid ni rnal 'byor pa bla
NK073(pu)005:1357: med kyi sngags la zhugs pa'i lam gyi gtso bo
NK073(pu)005:1359: bden pa'i dgongs pa rnam pa gnyis //
NK073(pu)005:1360: kun rdzob don dam bshad pa gyis //
NK073(pu)005:1361: zhes rgyud don bden pa gnyis kyis rdzogs rim du
NK073(pu)005:1362: bsdus pa de la go ba'i rlabs chen po yod
NK073(pu)005:1363: pa'i phyir ro // galpo'i lung don de ni /
NK073(pu)005:1364: bden pa gnyis kyi rdzogs rim 'ba' zhig la 'dod mi dgos kyi /
NK073(pu)005:1365: rdzogs rim kho na ni lam nyi tshe ba yin
NK073(pu)005:1366: pas lam de la snon pa gzhan zhig dgos so
NK073(pu)005:1367: snyam na ni rdo rje 'chang gi rgyud lung dpang
NK073(pu)005:1368: por bzhag ste rgyu mtshan gyi rigs pa 'dod dgur
NK073(pu)005:1369: bsnyad pas chog pa blo gros chen po rnams kyis
NK073(pu)005:1370: mkhyen pa nyid na'ang ma brjod do //
NK073(pu)005:1372: ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos //
NK073(pu)005:1373: gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te //
NK073(pu)005:1374: thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid //
NK073(pu)005:1375: de lta bu yi ngang du 'byung //
NK073(pu)005:1376: zhes rgyu lam bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu phyi rol nas
NK073(pu)005:1377: 'byung ba'i dus la ltos dgos pa lta bu ma
NK073(pu)005:1378: yina gyi / ranga gis mngona sum du rtogsa shing
NK073(pu)005:1379: yid ches te bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mthus rang
NK073(pu)005:1380: gi shin tu phra ba'i sgo gsum nyid sangs rgyas
NK073(pu)005:1381: su 'gyur bar gsungs pa ltar shes par bya'o //
NK073(pu)005:1383: slar yang mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas bstan par bzhed de /
NK073(pu)005:1384: rtogs pa bzhi'i don de gang gis 'grub na /
NK073(pu)005:1385: 'bras bu rnam par dag pa tshul bzhi'i sgo nas
NK073(pu)005:1386: 'jug par bya ba 'di yongs su sgrub pa la
NK073(pu)005:1387: ni mtshan nyid gsum gyis sngags pa'i 'dod don mthar
