NK073(pu)005:1389: bshad ma thag pa'i rtogsa pa rnam pa bzhi'i tshul
NK073(pu)005:1390: de shes rab kyis ma nor bar rig pa ni
NK073(pu)005:1391: rgyu shesa pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba zhes bshad do
NK073(pu)005:1392: // de'i rjes su stong pa chen po la sogs
NK073(pu)005:1393: pa'i rnal 'byor lngas yang nas yang du gomsa par
NK073(pu)005:1394: byed pa ni rkyen 'juga pa'i matshana nyid ting nge
NK073(pu)005:1395: // 'dzin to // rnal 'byor lnga po re re
NK073(pu)005:1396: zhing g.yo thob goms brtan mthar phyin gyi nyams lnga
NK073(pu)005:1397: rdzogs su slob tshul ni sgyu 'phrul lam rim du
NK073(pu)005:1398: // 'dzin to // blta la / kha cig tshogs lam gyi rnal 'byor bzhi dang /
NK073(pu)005:1399: sbyor lam gyi rnal 'byor gcig ces 'chad bzhin du /
NK073(pu)005:1400: rdzogs rim dang sbyar ba'i rnal 'byor lnga zhal gyis
NK073(pu)005:1401: 'ches pa de dag la ni sngags bla med kyi
NK073(pu)005:1402: sbyor lam la zhugs pa'i tshad de gang yin zhes
NK073(pu)005:1404: rdzogs rim du ma zhugs pa'i bla med kyi sbyor
NK073(pu)005:1405: lam la zhugs pa med pa ni rgyud sde 'di
NK073(pu)005:1406: skor dang / 'od gsal rdzogs chen gang gi lugs la'ang 'dra ba'i phyir te /
NK073(pu)005:1407: de ltar lung dang rigs pas 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes rtags gnyis pa spros pas mchog pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)005:1408: des na rnal 'byor lnga po gang rung ste la'ang
NK073(pu)005:1409: rim pa gnyis kyi char gyur na gnyis re yod
NK073(pu)005:1410: la / tshogs sgrub skor du zhib cha dgos pa
NK073(pu)005:1411: mang ba sogs snang yang 'dir yi ge nyung ngur
NK073(pu)005:1413: ting nge 'dzin gomsa pa'i mthus slob pa min pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1414: zung 'jug mngona du gyur pa ni 'bras bu'i matshana
NK073(pu)005:1415: nyid do // mtshan nyid de gsum gyis go rim bzhin du 'brel ba dang /
NK073(pu)005:1417: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ston te /
NK073(pu)005:1419: kun nas nyon mongsa pa dang rnam par byang ba'i
NK073(pu)005:1420: chos su btagsa pa thamsa cad ye gdod ma nas
NK073(pu)005:1421: gnyug ma'i sku gsunga thugs gsum gyi bdag nyid dang
NK073(pu)005:1422: rang rtsal tu ma gyur ba med pas sngar rgyu
NK073(pu)005:1423: gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul gyi skabs su byung
NK073(pu)005:1424: ba ltar srid zhi mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhina
NK073(pu)005:1425: gyis sangsa rgyas pa'i gzhi'i dbyings 'od gsal don dam
NK073(pu)005:1427: rang mdangs ye shes kyi gsal cha 'ja' lus gsang
NK073(pu)005:1428: chen rigs gcig tu byin gyis rlabs pa'i gzhi'i don
NK073(pu)005:1429: du rtogsa pa nirgyu shes pa'i matshana nyid do zhes
NK073(pu)005:1430: gong du yang bshad zin pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:1431: 'di dgos 'brel gyi nang nas 'brel ba dang mtshan
NK073(pu)005:1432: nyid gsum gyi nang tshan lta ba gnyis sbyar te
NK073(pu)005:1433: gsungs pa'i rgyu mtshan du 'agro'am mi 'gro mi 'gro
NK073(pu)005:1434: na yang zlos tsam du zad la /
NK073(pu)005:1435: 'gro na rgyu mtshan de bshad dgos so zhe na /
NK073(pu)005:1437: lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin gnyis gtso bor bdag gcig 'brel dang /
NK073(pu)005:1438: de dang 'bras bu gnyis phal cher de byung 'brel du 'ong mod kyi /
NK073(pu)005:1439: lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin de byung 'brel yin pa'ang yod do //
NK073(pu)005:1440: de lta na'ang lta ba la 'brel bar gsungs pa
NK073(pu)005:1441: ni dper na phar phyin theg par sems bskyed theg
NK073(pu)005:1442: chen lam gyi sdom pa bzhag pa bzhin te /
NK073(pu)005:1443: bskyed rdzogs gang yin kyang 'bras bu sku gnyis kyi
NK073(pu)005:1444: dngos rgyur 'gro ba la lta bas lam dang 'bras
NK073(pu)005:1445: bu'i tshul gyi spyir shar ba zhig dgos pas lta
NK073(pu)005:1446: ba ni lam gong 'og gi 'brel sbyor byed yin
NK073(pu)005:1447: te / shes rab kyis dkyus ma mthong na ting
NK073(pu)005:1448: 'dzin gyi rta rgyug pa mi 'ong ba'i don no
NK073(pu)005:1449: te / // lha'i rnam pa lam du gang byas
NK073(pu)005:1450: thams cad kyang sangs rgyas nga rgyal chen po'i ting
NK073(pu)005:1451: nge 'dzin du 'gro ba ni lta bas byang chub
NK073(pu)005:1452: chen po'i ye shes kyi tshul la nges pa rnyed
NK073(pu)005:1453: de bsgom pa'i lag rjes yin gyi /
NK073(pu)005:1454: zhi ba dgod kha yal le ba dang /
NK073(pu)005:1455: khro bo sdang mig ce re ba tsam zhig bsgom
NK073(pu)005:1456: pas bla na meda pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs sku
NK073(pu)005:1457: mi 'grub pa bzhin du bskyed rdzogs kyi khog gzhan
NK073(pu)005:1458: la yang rigs pa sbyar bar bya ste sla'o //
NK073(pu)005:1459: de'i phyir lta ba la sangsa rgyas su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin pa'i dona du 'brel ba zhes bya'o //
NK073(pu)005:1460: de'ang dang po lta ba rtogs pa kho nas mi chog gi /
NK073(pu)005:1461: de rtogs pa'i dgos pa ci 'dra ba zhig byed pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:1462: kun nas nyon mongsa pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:1463: rnam par byang ba'i chos dang /
NK073(pu)005:1464: rnal 'byor pa la ye shes gsal ba dang dngos
NK073(pu)005:1465: grub 'gugs pa'i sgo nas sgron ma dang lcags kyu
NK073(pu)005:1466: zhes pa'i sgras rgyud nas basngagasa pa sman sha lnga
NK073(pu)005:1467: dang bduda rtsi chen po lnga la sogsa par btagsa
NK073(pu)005:1468: pa thamsa cad ye nas gzhi'i chos sku rig stong
NK073(pu)005:1469: mnyam rdzogs chen po'i rol rtsal /
NK073(pu)005:1470: du ma ro gcig gi ngang la sangsa rgyas pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1471: mnyam pa chen po mi mnyam pa med pa'i don
NK073(pu)005:1472: la rim gnyis kyi rtog pa klong du gyur pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1473: sgo nas blang dor med par spyod pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:1474: de'ang las dang po pa dang grub pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs pa'i rim pa'am /
NK073(pu)005:1475: ye shes cung zad phebs pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:1476: ye shes la cung zad dbang thob pa la sogs
NK073(pu)005:1477: pa'i nges pas rang gi rgyud tshod dang bstun te
NK073(pu)005:1479: 'di'i spyod pa zhes gsungs pa ni nye rgyu'i spyod pa kho na la mi bya zhing /
NK073(pu)005:1480: bdud rtsi lnga la longs spyod pa rkyang pa yang min te /
NK073(pu)005:1481: gzhung de'i de ma thag par /
NK073(pu)005:1482: 'ajug pa'i matshana nyid do zhes ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid du gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:1483: de'i phyir ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i mnyam pa chen
NK073(pu)005:1484: po zhes gsungs pa'i nus pa de rtsal du 'don
NK073(pu)005:1485: pa gal che bas de 'dra'i mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK073(pu)005:1486: don de spyod yul du byed pa'i don yin zhing
NK073(pu)005:1487: / de'i yan lag rnams kyang der bsdu'o //
NK073(pu)005:1488: ting nge 'dzin de ni bla na med pa'i sangsa
NK073(pu)005:1489: rgyas su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir lta ba
NK073(pu)005:1491: sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i lam gyi rtse mo gsang sngags
NK073(pu)005:1492: bla med kyi rnal 'byor thun mong ma yin pa
NK073(pu)005:1493: thams cad rim pa gnyis kyi phyogs su 'du bar
NK073(pu)005:1494: rgyud las / sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa //
NK073(pu)005:1495: rim pa gnyis la yang dag brten //
NK073(pu)005:1496: bskyed pa yi ni rim pa dang //
NK073(pu)005:1497: rdzogs pa yi ni rim nyid do //
NK073(pu)005:1499: gal te de lta min par tshig 'dis bskyed rdzogs
NK073(pu)005:1500: phyogs re ba tsam zhig bstan pa yin na bla
NK073(pu)005:1501: med lugs kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor
NK073(pu)005:1502: gyi chings rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
NK073(pu)005:1504: thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
NK073(pu)005:1505: skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs //
NK073(pu)005:1506: zhes rim gnyis go rim bzhin du bgrod dgos par gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK073(pu)005:1507: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:1508: kun nas nyon mongsa pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:1509: rnam par byang ba'i chos spyi dang /
NK073(pu)005:1510: sman lnga dang badud rtsi lnga la sogsa pa rnal
NK073(pu)005:1511: 'byor pa'i longs spyod kyi khyad par du btagsa pa
NK073(pu)005:1512: thamsa cad ye nasa sangsa rgyas pa'i mnyam pa chen
NK073(pu)005:1513: po'i ngang du blang dor bsal bzhag med par 'jog
NK073(pu)005:1514: pa'i lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin rnams gong nas
NK073(pu)005:1515: gong du nus pa brtan zhing gsal snang 'phel ba'i
NK073(pu)005:1516: lag rjes su / rtsa rgyud snying por /
NK073(pu)005:1517: ye shes thig le de nyid la //
NK073(pu)005:1518: ye shes thig le nyid snang ba //
NK073(pu)005:1519: bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /
NK073(pu)005:1520: ces sogs gsungs pa bzhin du nam zhig na 'bad
NK073(pu)005:1521: rtsol med par yongs su dag pa'i ye shes kyi
NK073(pu)005:1522: ngang gcig tu lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)005:1523: ma dag pa'i gnas skabs nas kyang srid pa'i 'khora
NK073(pu)005:1524: ba nyid ye nas bla na med par sangsa rgyas
NK073(pu)005:1525: pa'i bsgrub gzhi'i rang bzhina de /
NK073(pu)005:1526: 'dir lam bsgom stobs kyis dag pa gnyis ldan mya
NK073(pu)005:1527: ngana las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid dam bdag nyid can
NK073(pu)005:1528: gyi sku dang ye shes phrin las dang bcas pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1529: ngo bo nyid du lhun gyis grub pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:1530: lhun gyis grub par bstan pa'i tshig snga ma lam mthar phyin pa'i sgo nas basngagasa pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:1531: 'dis gzhi dus kyi skye 'chi bar do gsum bla
NK073(pu)005:1532: na med pa'i 'bras bu chos skur bsgyur ba'i sgo
NK073(pu)005:1534: ldog cha'i dbang gis yin no //
NK073(pu)005:1535: de ni 'bras bu'i matshana nyid de /
NK073(pu)005:1536: mdor na sku gsung thugsa mi zad pa rgyan gyi
NK073(pu)005:1537: 'khor lo gang la mngona sum du gyur pa ni
NK073(pu)005:1539: mi zad pa zhes pa rgyun gyis rtag pa'i don dang /
NK073(pu)005:1540: rgyan zhes pa'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'geng pa'i rgyan te rgya ma chad pa'i don dang /
NK073(pu)005:1541: 'khor lo zhes pa gdul bya'i rgyud kyi sgrib pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1542: d+r+wa ba mtha' dag gcod pa'i don no zhes bla
NK073(pu)005:1548: sgrub pa chen po'i don te bsnyen sgrub yan lag
NK073(pu)005:1549: bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa lhun gyis grub par gyur
NK073(pu)005:1550: pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o //
NK073(pu)005:1551: spyi bskyed rdzogs kyi lam thams cad bsnyen sgrub yan
NK073(pu)005:1552: lag bzhi'i chings su bcing ba ni zab mo gter
NK073(pu)005:1553: gyi phyogs la yongs grags yin par ma zad /
NK073(pu)005:1554: snga 'gyur gyi rgyud sde chen po rnams dang /
NK073(pu)005:1555: na ro ta pa'i 'dus pa rgyud phyi ma'i 'grel pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:1556: byang chub sems dpa'i 'grel ba skor gsum la sogs
NK073(pu)005:1557: par yongs su grags pa'i shing rta chen po'i lugs
NK073(pu)005:1558: srol yin te / bsnyad pas chog go //
NK073(pu)005:1560: byang chub kyi semsa shes pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:1561: dang po stong nyid byang chub ste //
NK073(pu)005:1563: de'ang chos thamsa cad ye nas rang bzhin rnam dag
NK073(pu)005:1564: gi sangsa rgyas sam chos nyid shin tu rnam par
NK073(pu)005:1565: dag pa'i dbyings mtha' bzhi'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'i
NK073(pu)005:1566: gshis su gnyis snang gi spros pa thams cad nye
NK073(pu)005:1567: bar zhi ba'i rang bzhina gyis mnyam par bzhag pa
NK073(pu)005:1568: ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o //
NK073(pu)005:1569: de lta bu'i ngang du 'jog tshul yang shes bya'i
NK073(pu)005:1570: yin lugs de nyid lam gyis gsar du bsgrub cing
NK073(pu)005:1571: gnyen posa bcos su med de /
NK073(pu)005:1573: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
NK073(pu)005:1574: bzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
NK073(pu)005:1575: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
NK073(pu)005:1578: dngos rnams nyid ni dngos med par //
NK073(pu)005:1579: rtogs pa'i dbang bsgyur ting 'dzin yin //
NK073(pu)005:1580: zhes pa ltar ye ji bzhin pa'i ngang la bsal
NK073(pu)005:1581: bzhag spro bsdu med par lhod de bzhag par bya'o
NK073(pu)005:1582: // 'di yang slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes
NK073(pu)005:1583: gnyen phyi mas sgrub thabs kun bzang du sh+au nya
NK073(pu)005:1584: ta'i sngags don rnam thar sgo gsum la sbyar te
NK073(pu)005:1585: gsungs pa dang gnad gcig go //
NK073(pu)005:1587: stong nyid de'i ngang nas cho ga gsum bskyed lta
NK073(pu)005:1588: bu'i rim pas badga nyid lhar shesa shing bsgom pa
NK073(pu)005:1589: ste / de'ang chos thamsa cad ye nas sangsa rgyas
NK073(pu)005:1590: pa'i rang bzhin zhes gsungs pa ni sngar bshad pa
NK073(pu)005:1591: ltar phung po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK073(pu)005:1592: gyi bsgrub gzhir gnas pa'i don du bya'o //
NK073(pu)005:1593: de ltar gnas pas na badga nyid kyang ye nas dag pa lha'i rten gyi rang bzhina yina gyi /
NK073(pu)005:1594: da lta lam gyis gsar du sgrub pa ni ma yin para rtogsa pa ste kyang gi sgras ni /
NK073(pu)005:1595: gdags gzhi phung po rnams gzhi'i dkyil 'khor du gnas par ma zad /
NK073(pu)005:1596: btags pa'i chos gang zag bdag nyid kyang zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
NK073(pu)005:1597: sgrub pa ni yum bskyed pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:1598: de'ang yum chen mo zhes pa gsang ba snying por
NK073(pu)005:1599: snang ba'i dbyings dang zhes sogs gsungs pa'i thad kyi
NK073(pu)005:1601: rtogs pa'i dus na nam mkha'a la sogs pa'i 'byung
NK073(pu)005:1602: ba lnga dang dag pa'i dus su dbyingas 1phyug ma
NK073(pu)005:1603: la sogs pa'i rigs kyi btsun mo lnga yin pas
NK073(pu)005:1604: de skad ces brjod par gsungs so //
NK073(pu)005:1605: rtogs pa'i dus su nam 3makha'a 4las 2'byung ba bzhi dang /
NK073(pu)005:1606: dag pa'i tshe snang ba chen po chos nyid kyi
NK073(pu)005:1607: dbyings nas yum chena mo ye shes kyi sa chu
NK073(pu)005:1609: dag pa dang ma dag pa'i dus de dang de'i
NK073(pu)005:1610: brtan g.yo'i bya bar rab 'byams su byed pa'i skyed
NK073(pu)005:1611: yum ye nas yin pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)005:1612: de nyid btsun mo rnam pa lngar nga rgyal bya'o //
NK073(pu)005:1614: thabsa yab dang shes rab lha mo rnams snyoms 'jug gi bde bas rol pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:1615: de'ang rol pa tsam zhig min gyi sras 'byin byed pa'i rim pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1616: ji ltar byed na yum chen mo lnga shes rab
NK073(pu)005:1617: kyi brda dang yum gyi mkha'a stong pa nyid mtshon
NK073(pu)005:1618: byed kyi dbyings lasa phung po lnga'i dag pa sangsa
NK073(pu)005:1619: rgyas rigs lngar sbyar ba'i thabs kyi cha yab smona
NK073(pu)005:1620: pa med par ye nas zunga du 'brel ba lasa
NK073(pu)005:1621: byang chub semsa kyi sprin sprul pa lcam dral te
NK073(pu)005:1622: sems dpa' dang sems ma dang 'joms byed yab yum
NK073(pu)005:1623: la sogs par gyur pa'i rang bzhina ni zhes pa
NK073(pu)005:1624: de rnams kyi don dam bden pa la mi bya'i
NK073(pu)005:1625: me'i rang bzhin tsha ba zhes pa ltar lha tshogs
NK073(pu)005:1626: de thams cad bde stong gi rnam rol tshul gcig
NK073(pu)005:1628: sngon gyi bla ma rnams la yong su grags pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1629: sgyu 'phrul dkyil chog rnams su sras 'byin de ltar
NK073(pu)005:1630: bya ba zhig zhi ba'i skabs nas mi 'byung yang
NK073(pu)005:1631: / khro bo'i sgrub thabs las byung ba de gnyis
NK073(pu)005:1632: rigs pa mtshungs par ma zad gzhung 'di la gsungs
NK073(pu)005:1634: lha thams cad kyang rang gi sems nyid ye nas
NK073(pu)005:1635: rang bzhin rnam dag tu sangsa rgyas pa'i dona la
NK073(pu)005:1636: slar yang 'bras bu lam byed kyi ngang la khyad
NK073(pu)005:1638: sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus can dbyings
NK073(pu)005:1639: kyi btsun mo lnga la sgyu ma lta bu'i phung
NK073(pu)005:1640: po rnam par dag pa rigs lnga'i mgon po rnams
NK073(pu)005:1641: snyoms 'jug gi dgyes pas rola zhing /
NK073(pu)005:1642: de las byung ba'i bde mchog ye shes sgyu ma'i
NK073(pu)005:1643: rgyun la 'dod dgur spyod pa'i dus nyid na matshana
NK073(pu)005:1644: ma med pa'i don mi dmigs mkha'a dang snyomsa pa
NK073(pu)005:1645: ni de bzhin nyid kyi klong du tha dad med
NK073(pu)005:1646: par rtogs pas dbang bsgyur nas lhun gyis grub pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1648: zhes yab yum sras gsum dang rnam mthar sgo gsum
NK073(pu)005:1649: sbyar ba ni spyir rnam thar sgo gsum la rgyu
NK073(pu)005:1650: 'bras ngo bo gsum la sbyar ba dang /
NK073(pu)005:1651: bya byed las gsum la sbyar ba gnyis las 'dir phyi ma'i dbang du mdzad par snang zhing /
NK073(pu)005:1652: sras bya bar bzhag pa ni bde chen bskyed pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1653: bya ba la byas nas de'i snang cha sras kyi
NK073(pu)005:1655: kha cig longs spyad bya spyod byed spyad pa'i bya
NK073(pu)005:1656: ba gsum po go rim bzhin du bya ba dang
NK073(pu)005:1657: byed pa dang las gsum la 'dod pa ni dpal
NK073(pu)005:1658: ldan phyogs glang gi bzhed pa min no //
NK073(pu)005:1659: spyir sras bskyed tsam zhig bya bar bzhag na kun btus rtsa 'grel dang mi mthun yang /
NK073(pu)005:1660: smos ma thag pa ltar byas na 'grigs par mngon no //
NK073(pu)005:1661: der yang ma zad gsung bzlas brjod kyi rnal 'byor
NK073(pu)005:1662: spro bsdu'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas badud rnam
NK073(pu)005:1663: pa bzhi'ang btul nas dngos grub bsdu ba sogs rgyal
NK073(pu)005:1664: ba'i mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs par sgrub pa'i bar
NK073(pu)005:1665: gyi cho ga'i yan lag rnams mthar phyin pa'i don
NK073(pu)005:1666: 'grub pa'o // thun mong ma yin pa rdzogs rim dang sbyar na /
NK073(pu)005:1667: bla med kyi sbyor lam drod nas bzod pa'i bar ni bsnyen pa yin te /
NK073(pu)005:1668: byang chub kyi sems 'od gsal shes pa'am dngos gnas la mthong zhing /
NK073(pu)005:1669: bdag nyid ye shes sgyu ma'i lha'i skur dngos gnas su song ba med pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:1670: chos mchog ni nye bar bsnyen pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:1671: 'ja' tshon lta bu'i sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi lha skur dngos su song ba'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:1672: de nas slar yang rig ma'i 'dod yon khyad par
NK073(pu)005:1673: can la brten nas don gyi 'od gsal skyed pa
NK073(pu)005:1675: yum skyed pa mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:1676: slar yang zung 'jug rdo rje lta bu'i gzugs skur bzhengs te /
NK073(pu)005:1677: phyogs dus mnyam pa nyid kyi sprul pa'i gzugs rab
NK073(pu)005:1678: 'byams su snang ba ni sgrub pa chen po ste
NK073(pu)005:1679: / thabs kyi sku dang shes rab kyi thugs zung 'brel tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:1680: de yang sku mthar thug dang /
NK073(pu)005:1681: ye shes mthar thug la e wam dang ma ya
NK073(pu)005:1682: zhes pa'i sgras bsnyad pa rgyud na mang pas de
NK073(pu)005:1683: la brten pa'o // rgyas par he ru ka galpo las shes par bya'o //
NK073(pu)005:1684: bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i sgra bshad la mi 'dra ba'i bshad
NK073(pu)005:1685: tshul 'ga' zhig yod pa sogs kyang gzhan las shes
NK073(pu)005:1686: so // de dag thams cad kyang /
NK073(pu)005:1687: bdag nyid chen po pra dz+ny+aa rasmisa /
NK073(pu)005:1688: gsang ba snying po dpal ldan 'dus pa sogs //
NK073(pu)005:1689: bskyed pa ma h+aa yo ga ji bzhin tu //
NK073(pu)005:1690: zhes gsungs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig la dpyad nas cung zad 'bru snon byas pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1692: chos thamsa cad gdoda ma nyid nas ngo bo rnam
NK073(pu)005:1693: par daga pa'i chos nyid yid bzhin gyi gzhal yas
NK073(pu)005:1694: khang rgya yongsa su ma chad pa'i 'khora lora gnas
NK073(pu)005:1695: pa la / ye nas ji ltar yod pa de
NK073(pu)005:1696: bzhin du de dang rnam pa 'dra ba'i thabs kyis
NK073(pu)005:1697: lam du byas te bla na med pa'i ye shes
NK073(pu)005:1699: zhes pa'i 'ang sgras bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi dang
NK073(pu)005:1700: sbyar nas rim pa gnyis bshad du yod par ma
NK073(pu)005:1701: zad ces bshad rgyur mngon no //
NK073(pu)005:1702: de la re zhig dang por gsang sngags thabsa kyi
NK073(pu)005:1703: theg pa'i rgyud sde dang bstan bcos kyi gzhung gdams
NK073(pu)005:1704: gang tu 'char ba'i thos pa mang du tshol ba
NK073(pu)005:1706: gdong g.yogs ma phye bar dkyil 'khor blta ba med pa ji 'dra ba de 'dra'o //
NK073(pu)005:1707: de ltar thos pa bsags pa'i mthus rgyud dona phyin
NK073(pu)005:1708: ci ma log par don spyi'i go ba rnam dag
NK073(pu)005:1709: gi steng nas rtogsa pa ni dkyil 'khor mthong ba
NK073(pu)005:1710: ste / 'di la rigs pa phra mo zhig kyang yod do //
NK073(pu)005:1711: rtogsa pa nas don ji lta ba bzhin du ting
NK073(pu)005:1712: nge 'dzin gyis gomsa par byed pa ni dkyil 'khor
NK073(pu)005:1713: mthong nas de nyid du zhugsa pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1714: zhugsa nasa bsgom stobs kyis bde ba chen po'i ting
NK073(pu)005:1715: 'dzin mngona du gyur pa ni dngos grub chen po
NK073(pu)005:1716: thob pa'o // de ltar na tshul 'di la ni
NK073(pu)005:1717: bskyed pa nas rdzogsa pa chen po'i bar gyi ye
NK073(pu)005:1718: shes kyi tshul chen po mthar phyin pa'i don to
NK073(pu)005:1719: thob pa'o // // yi ge 'khora lo tshogsa chena
NK073(pu)005:1720: gyi sa zhes pa rang 'grel du ye shes dang
NK073(pu)005:1721: mtshan ma'i yi ge gnyis mdzad cing /
NK073(pu)005:1723: yi ge'i sprin 'phro bas yi ge 'khor lo tshogs
NK073(pu)005:1724: chen zhes sprul pa cho 'phrul gyi yi ge dang
NK073(pu)005:1725: / chos ston pa brda'i yi ge rnam par 'phro ba la mdzad /
NK073(pu)005:1726: gtsang t+aika tu ni yi ge zhes pa chos thams
NK073(pu)005:1727: cad ming tshig yi ges btags tsam ma gtogs rang
NK073(pu)005:1728: bzhin gyis grub pa med de /
NK073(pu)005:1729: de ltar med bzhin du snang cha sku dang ye
NK073(pu)005:1730: shes kyi 'khor lo bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
NK073(pu)005:1731: tshogs chen ye rdzogs su bzhugs pa zhes kyang bshad
NK073(pu)005:1732: mod / 'on kyang yi ge ni ak+sha ra'i sgra
NK073(pu)005:1733: las mi 'gyur ba la 'jug pas mtshan brjod las
NK073(pu)005:1734: mod / / yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag /
NK073(pu)005:1735: ces pa 'grel chen dri med 'od du drangs pa na /
NK073(pu)005:1736: mi 'gyur mchog ste rnam par dag /
NK073(pu)005:1737: ces 'byung ba ltar 'pho 'gyur gnyis su med pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1738: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs chen po 'phro ba'i
NK073(pu)005:1739: don te / sa de la zhes pa mi slob
NK073(pu)005:1740: zung 'jug la byed pas de nyid du lhun gyis
NK073(pu)005:1741: grub pa'i tshul tu 'juga pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:1742: lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul du 'jug lugs ni sa
NK073(pu)005:1743: brgyad pa yan chad na 'bad rtsol rags pa zhi
NK073(pu)005:1744: ba'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes lta bu la
NK073(pu)005:1745: mi bya'i / snyigs dus kyi tshe thung gcig la sangs rgyas 'grub pa'i don yin te /
NK073(pu)005:1746: skyes pu blo rtsal rab kyis phung khams thams cad
NK073(pu)005:1747: ye nas sangsa rgyas kyi bsgrub gzhir gnas pa'i don
NK073(pu)005:1748: riga nasa gomsa pa drag rdul lam shugs drag tu
NK073(pu)005:1750: de'i phyir gzhi dus nas yod yod pa'i chos shig
NK073(pu)005:1751: thabs mkhas kyis lam du byas nas myur du rnam
NK073(pu)005:1752: pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang dam par bgrod
NK073(pu)005:1753: pa'i sngags bla med kyi thabs mkhas khyad par can
NK073(pu)005:1754: 'di ni / skye bo blo gros dman pa phal gyi bya ba ni ma yin no //
NK073(pu)005:1756: phal gyis thos te ji ltar bsam kyang gnas 'di
NK073(pu)005:1757: shin tu rtogs par dka' bas na bdena zhing mi
NK073(pu)005:1758: bslu ba dang zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i don
NK073(pu)005:1759: yin par mi shes pas yid ches par mi 'gyur
NK073(pu)005:1760: ro // yada ma chesa pa dang skye bo phal
NK073(pu)005:1761: cher gyi blo la go dka' zhing bdena pa dang
NK073(pu)005:1762: zab pa ma shes pas rang nyamsa dang sbyar nas
NK073(pu)005:1763: ro // / gzhan kun kyang de dang 'dra snyam
NK073(pu)005:1764: nas de yang yogsa rdzun no zhes skyes bu rab
NK073(pu)005:1765: la skur pa 'debas shing sun 'byin pa'i blo skye
NK073(pu)005:1766: par 'gyur pas rab tu gasnga bar bya ba yin
NK073(pu)005:1767: pa'i phyir yang de bzhin gshegs pas gasnga ba'i theg
NK073(pu)005:1769: de bas na chos thamsa cad ye nas sangs rgyas
NK073(pu)005:1770: pa'i don la ma nor bar rtogsa pa'i blo gros
NK073(pu)005:1771: ma skyes kyi bar du mos pa chung ngu thega
NK073(pu)005:1772: pa 'og ma pas 'gro ba'i don byas na slob
NK073(pu)005:1773: ma'i nyams dang ma sbyar bar ci thod thod du
NK073(pu)005:1774: chos bstan pas gdul bya chud zos su 'gyur te
NK073(pu)005:1776: gang zhig gang gang la dga' ba //
NK073(pu)005:1777: de yis de nyid sngar spyad bya //
NK073(pu)005:1778: nyams par gyur par dam chos kyi //
NK073(pu)005:1779: snod ni cis kyang ma yin no //
NK073(pu)005:1781: rgyu mtshan de nyid kyi phyir gdul bya chud mi za pa'i phyir ram ched du /
NK073(pu)005:1782: slob dpon gyis 'khor ba'i skyon dang mya ngan lasa 'adsa pa'i yon tan dang /
NK073(pu)005:1783: gzhan yang thun mong gi theg pas rgyud smin par
NK073(pu)005:1784: byas nas gdod thun mong ma yin pa'i theg pa
NK073(pu)005:1785: la gzhug pa'i sgo mtha'a dag la makhasa par bya
NK073(pu)005:1786: ba yin gyi / mdo sngags kyi theg pa'i phyogsa
NK073(pu)005:1787: 'ga' yang mi shesa pas slob dpona gyisa bzung du
NK073(pu)005:1788: mi rung bar rgyud sde rgya mtsho nas 'byung ngo
NK073(pu)005:1789: ba yin gyi / // gnyis pa la /
NK073(pu)005:1791: rgyas par bshad pa gnyis las /
NK073(pu)005:1793: de ltar lta ba'i khyad par gyis de dang 'brel
NK073(pu)005:1794: ba'i dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyang nang phan tshun
NK073(pu)005:1795: khyad 'jug pa'i bya brag gi dbye ba mang du
NK073(pu)005:1797: de rgyas par phye na smos kyis mi ldang yang /
NK073(pu)005:1798: 'dir ni dngos dang zhar la 'ong ba gnyis su bshad par bzhed do //
NK073(pu)005:1803: de la dka' thub med pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:1804: 'jiga rten phyal ba dang mur thug go //
NK073(pu)005:1806: de dag ni thar pa thob pa'i ched du 'jig
NK073(pu)005:1807: rten phyi ma phan chad kyi don la sems pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1808: sgo nas dka' thub sgrub pa med pa'i phyir te
NK073(pu)005:1809: / 'di snang gi tshe gang po tsam zhig gtso bor 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:1811: daka'a thub yoda pa gang zhe na /
NK073(pu)005:1812: de ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK073(pu)005:1813: 'jig rten gyi dka' thub dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dka' thub gsum mo //
NK073(pu)005:1814: de las dang po ni rgyang 'phen dang mu stegsa pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:1815: rgyang 'phen tshe dang nor la sogs pa sgrub pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1816: gsang sngags kyi kun tu spyod pa la gnas pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1817: phyir dang / mu stegs rang gis 'dod pa'i thar
NK073(pu)005:1818: pa don du gnyer te me lnga dang phyugs kyi
NK073(pu)005:1819: brtul zhugs sogs lus la gdung pa skyed pa'i dka'
NK073(pu)005:1820: thub spyod pa mang ba'i phyir ro //
NK073(pu)005:1822: byams sogs rmongs dang 'gal med phyir //
NK073(pu)005:1823: nyes pa shin tu tshar gcod min //
NK073(pu)005:1826: gzugs can min phyir sdig lci min //
NK073(pu)005:1827: zhes sogs kyi skabs su ji skad gsungs pa ltar /
NK073(pu)005:1828: lugs de dag la srid pa'i rtsa ba dang 'dzin
NK073(pu)005:1829: stangs dngos su 'gal ba'i lam bsgrub pa med pas
NK073(pu)005:1830: ji ltar byas kyang 'jig rten te srid pa'i ra
NK073(pu)005:1833: khyod kyi bstan las phyir phyogs pa'i //
NK073(pu)005:1834: skye bo ma rig gis ldong pa //
NK073(pu)005:1835: srid rtse'i bar du song nas kyang //
NK073(pu)005:1836: sdug bsngal yang 'byung srid pa bsgrubs //
NK073(pu)005:1838: de'i phyir 'jiga rten pa'i daka'a thub dang zhes smos so //
NK073(pu)005:1840: nyan thos kyi dka' thub dang /
NK073(pu)005:1841: byang chub semsa dpa'i daka'a thub dang /
NK073(pu)005:1842: bla na meda pa'i daka'a thub bo //
NK073(pu)005:1844: slar yang de gzhung du bstan pa ni /
NK073(pu)005:1845: de la phyal ba ni rgyu 'bras la rmongs pa'i phyir dka' thub med pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1846: mur thug pa ni chad par lta ba'i phyir dka' thub med pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1847: rgyang 'phen pa ni tshe 'di'i khyad par sgrub pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1848: phyir gtsang sbra la sogsa pa'i dka' thub can no
NK073(pu)005:1849: // mu stegsa ni bdag rtag pa zhig yod pa
NK073(pu)005:1850: de dag par bya ba'i phyir lus sun 'byin cing
NK073(pu)005:1851: me lnga brten pa la sogsa pa'i dka' thub dang
NK073(pu)005:1852: brtul zhugsa loga par spyod pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1854: nyan thos kyi dka' thub ni /
NK073(pu)005:1856: sdig pa ci yang mi bya ste //
NK073(pu)005:1857: dge pa phun sum tshogsa par spyad //
NK073(pu)005:1858: ranga gi semsa ni yongsa su 'dul //
NK073(pu)005:1859: 'di ni sangsa rgyas bstan pa yin //
NK073(pu)005:1861: lhag pa tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'i dbang du mdzad
NK073(pu)005:1862: nas nyes spyod kyi sgo 'phar gcod pa sdig pa
NK073(pu)005:1863: ci yang mi bya ba dang /
NK073(pu)005:1864: lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi bslab pa'i dbang du
NK073(pu)005:1865: mdzad nas spong ba bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo la
NK073(pu)005:1866: gnas pa dge chos phun sum tshogs par spyad pa
NK073(pu)005:1867: dang / lhag pa shes rab kyi bslab pa'i dbang
NK073(pu)005:1868: du mdzad nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba gcod pa
NK073(pu)005:1869: rang sems yongs su 'dul ba ste /
NK073(pu)005:1870: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rtogs pa'i chos rnams kyi
NK073(pu)005:1871: 'gag sdom ni de tsam du 'dus so zhes gsungs
NK073(pu)005:1873: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos thamsa cad kun
NK073(pu)005:1874: rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis char bden grub tu
NK073(pu)005:1875: so so nas yod par lta ba dang /
NK073(pu)005:1876: nges 'byung gi bsam pa khyad par can gyis yid drangs te /
NK073(pu)005:1877: so so thar pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas /
NK073(pu)005:1879: mi dge pa ni spong pa'i dka' thub dang brtul zhugsa spyod pa ste /
NK073(pu)005:1880: gtso bor rkang pa dang po'i tshig de'i drang mtshams du 'agro'o //
NK073(pu)005:1881: dge ba dang sdig pa bden pa gnyis ka na
NK073(pu)005:1882: grub par blta zhes pa'i skabs su rtsod tshul mang
NK073(pu)005:1883: yang / nyan thos sde pa'i dbang du btang na gang dang yang 'gal ba mi snang ngo //
NK073(pu)005:1884: byang chub semsa dpa'i dka' thub ni /
NK073(pu)005:1885: byang chub semsa dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa las /
NK073(pu)005:1886: rkyen du 'atshamas par don mi byed //
NK073(pu)005:1887: rdzu 'phrul bsdigsa la sogas mi byed //
NK073(pu)005:1888: snying rjer ldan zhing byamsa phyir dang //
NK073(pu)005:1889: semsa dge ba la nyes pa med //
NK073(pu)005:1891: sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal las bsgral
NK073(pu)005:1892: 'dod kyi snying rje chen po'i blos zin na chos
NK073(pu)005:1893: thamsa cad theg pa chen por 'gyur ro //
NK073(pu)005:1894: chos la sgra 'jug pa'i yul bcu yod par bshad kyang /
NK073(pu)005:1895: skabs 'dir lam la chos zhes gsungs pa'o //
NK073(pu)005:1896: de'i phyir rnam pa'am ltar snang du dge ba dang
NK073(pu)005:1897: mi dge ba gang spyod kyang byang sems kyi sdom
NK073(pu)005:1899: byang chub semsa dpa'i sdom pa ni mdora na snying rje chena posa gzhi bzung nas spyod de /
NK073(pu)005:1900: gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa'i mdor ded dpon snying rje chen po'i byung ba bzhin no //
NK073(pu)005:1901: de bas na tshig 'di ni rgyal ba'i sras kyi
NK073(pu)005:1902: spyod pa sbyin sogs thabs dang shes rab thams cad
NK073(pu)005:1903: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i
NK073(pu)005:1904: ming 'thob pa ni rtsa ba snying rje chen po
NK073(pu)005:1906: des zin cing sems can gyi don du 'gyur na
NK073(pu)005:1907: srog gcod dang bsdigs bskrad la sogs pa rnams kyang
NK073(pu)005:1908: dge ba'i tshogs su 'gyur na gzhan lta yang ci
NK073(pu)005:1909: smos zhes pa'i don yin gyi /
NK073(pu)005:1910: gsod gcod rgyal pa'i sras kyi dka' thub kyi sdoms su bstan pa dang lta bu gtan min te /
NK073(pu)005:1911: rgyas par dpal ldan zhi ba 'tsho'i sdom pa nyi
NK073(pu)005:1912: shu pa'i 'grel ba las shes dgos par yod do
NK073(pu)005:1913: // bla na meda pa sngags kyi dka' thub ni /
NK073(pu)005:1914: dam tshig chen po'i mdo las /
NK073(pu)005:1915: sangsa rgyas theg par rab ngesa na //
NK073(pu)005:1916: nyon mongsa 'doda lnga kun spyod kyang //
NK073(pu)005:1918: de la tshul khrimsa phun sum tshogsa //
NK073(pu)005:1920: de'ang rdo rje snying po rgyan las /
NK073(pu)005:1921: 'dod chags rnam pa bzhi'i gnyen por sngags kyi rgyud sde chen po bzhi gsungs par bshad pa ltar /
NK073(pu)005:1922: sngags kyi ched du bya ba'i gdul bya ni nyon
NK073(pu)005:1923: mongs la lam byed kyi thabs mkhas la 'jug nus
NK073(pu)005:1924: pa'i gang zag khyad par can kho nar nges shing
NK073(pu)005:1926: chos thamsa cad ye nas mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i shes rab dang /
NK073(pu)005:1927: gdul bya snying rjes mi gtong ba'i thabs chen po can nyid kyi phyir /
NK073(pu)005:1928: gzhan don du 'gyur na mngon spyod la sogs pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1929: dus su stongs kyi sems zhe sdang skyed par gsungs
NK073(pu)005:1930: pa lta bu'i dmigs bsal ba'i skabs na snying rje
NK073(pu)005:1932: zhe sdang ni spang du med pa ste ched du
NK073(pu)005:1933: ma spang yang shing las byung ba'i srin bus shing
NK073(pu)005:1934: nyid za ba bzhin du thar pa mchog gi bar
NK073(pu)005:1935: chad du gyur pa'i chos rnams sbyong ba'i lhan cig
NK073(pu)005:1937: dpal mchog dang por rgyu'i kun slong snying rje chen
NK073(pu)005:1938: pos drangs nas dus kyi kun slong drag shul gyi
NK073(pu)005:1939: sems su byas te las 'ga' zhig rtsom par gsungs
NK073(pu)005:1940: pa bzhin no // de bas na rgyu'i kun slong
NK073(pu)005:1941: ni ji ltar yang snying rje chen pos gzhi bzung
NK073(pu)005:1942: ba zhig dgos so zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
NK073(pu)005:1943: de ltar te mnyam nyid kyi gnas lugs rtogs pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1944: thabs mkhas kyi tshul ma rtogsa pa rnams la thugsa
NK073(pu)005:1945: rje chen po mi 'byung ba ni ma yin te
NK073(pu)005:1947: mdor na ji ltar lta bas ye nas rang bzhin
NK073(pu)005:1948: rnam par dag par rtogs pa bzhina du de'i tshod
NK073(pu)005:1949: dang sbyar ba'i dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyang de
NK073(pu)005:1950: ltar rnam par dag par spyod pa bya'i /
NK073(pu)005:1951: rang gi nyams dang ma sbyar ba'i spyod pa de 'dra ba dang po nas rtsom pa bkag ste /
NK073(pu)005:1953: ke ta ka'i me tog glang po che gzhan gyis zos pa las brun dang /
NK073(pu)005:1954: phal gyi glang po ches zos na gla rtsi lta bur 'gyur ba'i dpe grangs mtshams bzhin no //
NK073(pu)005:1955: des na spyod pa rgyud tshod dang sbyar bar bya ste /
NK073(pu)005:1956: 'di ni sngags bla med kho na'i spyod pa thun min min gyi /
NK073(pu)005:1957: rgyud sde 'og ma'i srol kyang yin no //
NK073(pu)005:1958: gsum pa mjug gi don la /
NK073(pu)005:1959: gdams ngag gang la gtad pa'i snod dang /
NK073(pu)005:1960: brtsam zin pa'i mtha' byang gdags pa gnyis las /
NK073(pu)005:1962: bi ma la mi tra'i khog gzhung las /
NK073(pu)005:1963: blo rno zab brtan myur ba dang //
NK073(pu)005:1965: snod kyi gang zag khyad par can zhig la man ngag legs par gtad pa med na /
NK073(pu)005:1966: snod min gyi rgyud la mi 'byor bas gsang sngags
NK073(pu)005:1967: 'dre la gtan ba lta bu'i tshul du 'gyur zhing
NK073(pu)005:1968: gdams pa'i sarga log pa dang /
NK073(pu)005:1969: brgyud pa'i byin rlabs zab mo nyams su 'gro bas na 'dir gsungs pa /
NK073(pu)005:1970: lta ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gasnga ba chen po'i man ngag 'di ni /
NK073(pu)005:1972: rtog ge ngan pa'i gdon gyis barlamasa shing /
NK073(pu)005:1973: rdo rje'i lam la mos pa chung ba rnams kyi spyod yul min no //
NK073(pu)005:1974: 'o na su zhig gi yul du 'gyur zhe na /
NK073(pu)005:1975: ji ltar dmus longa gi mig gi sgrib byed ranga
NK073(pu)005:1976: phye nas yongs su dag pa'i mig rnyed pa ltar
NK073(pu)005:1977: / zab mo'i chos la 'jug pa yang ba'i shes rab dang /
NK073(pu)005:1978: bshes gnyen dam pa bstan pa'i thabsa mkhas pa sogs tshogs kyi bsags rgyab mang zhing /
NK073(pu)005:1979: de 'dra'i rnam dpyod kyi sgyu rtsal 'chang ba'i skyes bu mchog rnams kyi yul du 'gyur ro //
NK073(pu)005:1980: 'on kyang snyigs ma'i dus su skal ba phun sum
NK073(pu)005:1981: tshogs pa'i slob ma de lta bu u dum wa
NK073(pu)005:1982: ra ltar rnyed par dka' mod kyi /
NK073(pu)005:1983: brgya lam du yoda na de dag dang 'aphrad nas
NK073(pu)005:1984: don du 'gyura bar shog caga ces sangs rgyas gnyis
NK073(pu)005:1985: pa des thugs shin tu brtse bas smon lam du
NK073(pu)005:1987: lta ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rtsa pa'i rgyud kyi man ngag /
NK073(pu)005:1988: gsang sngags thams cad kyi spyi chings /
NK073(pu)005:1990: theg pa mtha' dag gi snang byed /
NK073(pu)005:1991: bstan pa thams cad kyi spyi sdom /
NK073(pu)005:1992: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i
NK073(pu)005:1993: mdzod chen po rdzogsa so ste brtsams zin pa'i don
NK073(pu)005:1994: no // de ltar na sangs rgyas gnyis pa pad+m+aa
NK073(pu)005:1995: ka ra'i rdo rje'i gsung 'khrul pa dang rnyogs pas
NK073(pu)005:1996: bslad pa med pa 'di nyid gangs can du byung
NK073(pu)005:1997: ba'i rgya gzhung rnams kyi snga shos dang sgrub rgyud
NK073(pu)005:1998: shing rta chen po'i ring lugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i
NK073(pu)005:1999: chu 'go lta bur gyur pa yin pas /
NK073(pu)005:2000: phyogs zhen gyi kun nas bslangs pa'i blang dor gdon
NK073(pu)005:2001: gyis rang rgyud mi dkrugs par thar 'dod blo gros
NK073(pu)005:2002: rnam por yangs pa rnams kyis skal ba dang ldan
NK073(pu)005:2003: pa'i gang zag rnams la legs par 'chad cing rgyas
NK073(pu)005:2004: par spel bas rgyal ba dgyes pa'i phrin las phyogs
NK073(pu)005:2005: med du bskyang bar mdzad 'tshal lo //
NK073(pu)005:2006: bdag 'dra dam pa'i rnam thar gyis dbul yang //
NK073(pu)005:2007: 'khrul med dam pa'i mgon gyis rjes bzung zhing //
NK073(pu)005:2008: ris med zab dgu'i chos kyi nor bu rnyed //
NK073(pu)005:2009: bstan 'gror phan 'dod lhag bsam zol med pas //
NK073(pu)005:2010: 'di yang sangs rgyas rnga yab gling pa yi //
NK073(pu)005:2011: khyad 'phags gzhung gi rgyun bzang spel ba'i blos //
NK073(pu)005:2012: gdams khrid gces bsdus mdzod chen nang nor du //
NK073(pu)005:2013: bzhugs phyir legs bshad dbyig gi snying po bsdus //
NK073(pu)005:2014: skye bar zab rgyas mdo sngags chos mdzod 'dzin //
NK073(pu)005:2015: rgyal dbang pad+ma'i phrin las mkha' khyab sgrub //
NK073(pu)005:2016: mtha' yas 'gro kun gdod ma'i sa mchog tu //
NK073(pu)005:2017: sgrol ba'i rnam thar chos dbyings mthar khyab shog /
NK073(pu)005:2018: 'adi'ang gdod ma'i mgon po bde ba chen po dang
NK073(pu)005:2019: zhal mi gnyis pa rje bla ma pad+ma 'od gsal
NK073(pu)005:2020: mdo sngags gling pa'i zhal snga nas rtsa ba'i lung
NK073(pu)005:2021: dang gnad don bkrol ba'i ljags bshad rjes gnang dang
NK073(pu)005:2022: bcas pa stsal nas gdams mdzod du 'khod par gyis
NK073(pu)005:2023: shig pa'i bka' lung spyi bor phebs par brten /
NK073(pu)005:2024: ris med kyi rnal 'byor spyod pa blo gros mtha'
NK073(pu)005:2025: yas pa'i sdes bla ma'i zhal lung mdor bsdus te
